There is no meaning to victory, if you win alone.
I am the shadow that has overcome the light.
I'm going to teach you how to talk to your seniors, baldy.
Even if other people think it’s meaningless, it’s disgusting for me to quit, even when the possibility is 0. Therefore, I will never... Give up !
What a laughable attempt. You should just stay where you are, groveling at my feet.

* The Zone * In this state of extreme focus, all unnecessary thoughts disappear and the athlete becomes absorbed in his play. Only those who have practiced and practiced earn the right to stand before the door, and it only opens unpredictably. It is the ultimate domain, open only to the chosen.
If there's no one happy, is it really a victory?
It’s not the time to be scared. Of course it’s better if the opponent is strong rather than weak, right!
You'll always stand by the light. That is your basketball.
The past and the future are not the same, but they're not completely separate either.
No matter how many more points you have at the end of the game, if you're not happy, that's not a victory.
Listen to your seniors once in a while or I will kill you.
I don't like practice. I just hate losing even more.
For a winner, there is nothing to say to a loser.
Do you think everyone can make their dreams come true through hard work? Hard work isn't always rewarded.
There's no such thing as useless effort.
When one thing ends, another begins.

They say some defeats are meaningful and losing makes you stronger. Do you understand what that means? For living creatures victory is life, and defeat means death. It's an extreme example, but humans retain that instinct. Those who know the terror of defeat, hunger for victory.
The only times we're fated to lose are in fictional stories. This is our drama! We decide what the plot will be!
Be Yourself because an Original is worth more than a Copy
You keep working HARD in order to win and you get better little by little. To IMMERSE yourself in something you like, that's what it means to enjoy something fully.
There’s no meaning if you win alone!
With out strong opponents, living isn't fun. It's perfect if I can't win.
This is our show. We're the ones who are writing the script.
If we give our best in something we love, we'll enjoy the victories from the bottom of our hearts.
All these things you guys seek....hard work, guts, faith....I'll crush them all.
Don't give up! There's no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!

It's not about doing what it takes to win. Sei-chan told me before ""Winning is just like breathing"". Victory isn't something that Sei-chan seeks. It's a natural part of his life. It's a basic bodily function.
Don’t you know the saying ‘Man proposes
No matter how hard you practice, ""someday"" and ""maybe"" aren't good enough. I need to know if you have ambitious goals and the will to accomplish them.
It's when things are tough that you have to keep your head up high. You won't find hope lying on the ground.
There's no need to pretend to be cool. Let's show our lame sides. That's who we really are, after all.
There’s no reason to pretend to be cool. Let’s show our lame sides. That’s who we really are, after all.
People must continue to fight for their fate. Unless they fight for the future they wish for, they will never know whether or not they can attain it.
I am who I am now because of my past. Calling any choice I made a mistake would be calling who I am now a mistake.

Even if I’m not perfect… Even if I’m not the ideal me… He says that I’m still my own person.
The point of life isn’t to be perfect.
It’s to do want you want to do, to be who you want to be.
That’s how I should be trying to live.
There won't be any pain if you don't do anything stupid.
What defines humans... Defines us? Nobody will notice a change on the inside if you look the same on the outside.
If you were given the chance to redo your life, would you take it?
You'll discover that problems have a way of working themselves out if you talk to your friends.
If I show people how weak I am, they won't need me anymore.
What you can't accomplish alone, becomes doable when you're with someone else.
Everyone has different faces.
What are people? What is the "self"? So long as you look like someone else, no one can't tell who's really on the inside.
If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
After spending most of my life trying to live as someone else wanted, I’d apparently forgotten who I was.
I don't care what normal people do anymore. I'm going to live my life the way that I want to.

If you're lonely, you should say something! If you're worried, say something! Most people aren't as sharp as you are! If you want those people to understand you, you should say something! Even if you're worried that you'll embarrass yourself, you should still say something!
You can never tell what'll happen next in life. But so long as you have faith in your feet, the road you walk will be a part of you.
I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
Don’t forget that kindness can hurt people too.
When you're hiding a secret from the whole world, it puts a weight on your shoulders.
The point of life isn't to be perfect. It's to do what you want to do. To be who you want to be.
Never forget that kindness can hurt instead of help.
What are people? What is the ""self""? So long as you look like someone else, no one can't tell who's really on the inside.
Even if I’m not perfect… Even if I’m not the ideal me… He says that I’m still my own person.
Hippo.
(to Kyo) oh, shut up. shut up! shut up! AAHHH!! AAHHH!!
Maybe I'm not perfect. Maybe I have a long way to go. But someday... someday I'll be able to stand and walk on my own. Without hurting anyone... and without being a burden. (to Kazuma)
You sicko...I knew you were depraved, but I never imagined how low you could sink! (to shigure)
I do...want to be with you...I want to be with you...! (To Tohru and Arisa)
One more word Shigure and the entire publishing industry will know every embarrassing thing you've done since you were four.
I never... [chuckles]... laughed this hard in front of my parents.(to Tohru)
Hmm... you can go anywhere you want? Cuz' I'll go... anywhere with you, y'know. (To Kureno)
You talk big yet you're nothing but Akito's toy! (To Yuki)
I won't ask what you wish for. I only hope it comes true by your own two hands. (to Kyo)
It's frightening that there's no guarantee that I'll ever be loved.

Is that the kinda attitude you show to someone concerned about you?! What's gonna happen to the person who wants to see ya, huh?!?! Its obvious... Its obvious you wish to see each other... SO COME AND FREAKIN' SEE ME ALREADY!!
The scariest and the most painful thing is to be hated by someone you truly love.
It's Valentine's day, silly! It's the day when lovers are together!

Ah, I'm sorry, I guess this is farewell. Let Tohru find happiness. Please by many people let her be loved. If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered". Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered. (Part of Kyoko's last words that were never said)
I just told you what I think, now say something DAMMIT!
I yearn for you more than anyone else. I love you Akito... And that is the irrevocable unwavering truth.(shigures answer to akitos question "do you like me?" during a child hood flashback)
I'll always love you. (To Yuki)
Don't judge me based on the same story and laugh.
So this is how...it feels... (After just being released from the curse)
I do intend to pay you for your services.

I'm not sure why I've decided to do this. I'm not any stronger than I was, and nothing else has changed. But all the same, this time I'm not going to run away. It's okay to feel weak sometimes. It's okay to be afraid. The important thing is that we face our fears. That's... that's what makes us strong.
To truly love someone, is to always put their feelings before your own... no matter what.
And if when everything ends, nothing is left in my hands...that's alright.
Thanks for such a boring time, it was a blast!
...There's nothing to feel sorry for on my behalf. I've been a very selfish girl. For the first time, I was able to see that. Thank you for worrying about me, mama. (to her mother)
Leave her out of this... who we let in this house is really none of your concern. You're the one who doesn't belong here. (to Kyo)
Tohru, you must always be yourself and do things at your own pace. Someday... you'll catch up.
The biggest idiot is you! So why don't you go back to school or whatever it is that idiots like you do and don't ever bother me again! You piece of shit! (To Yuki)
...If Tohru-chan were to die, I...I wonder if I'd be able to smile again one year later? Or if I'd wish that I could forget ever having met her. ...Tohru-chan... has tried really hard...
I don't think anyone is born with a reason to live. It's something you have to find for yourself.

So stupid! Stupid, Stupid! You're so stupid! You want to live your life scared of being ratted out?! Screw that! I'd rather let everyone know everything!! (to Yuki, Tohru, Kyo, and Momiji while destroying a classroom)
There are things that take a long time to acquire. Friends. Love. Really, nothing has been a waste.
I'm creating trouble. Can't you see?
True kindness isn't something we're born with. It's something we had to work on... (to Tohru)

You make me sick, you and your pathetic girly whining... You're not a MAN! You're just a little kitty-cat who's afraid to fight! Know what?! YOU CAN GO TO HELL! HAHAHAHAHA! UGH! (gets kicked by Kyo in the face)
I started crying. It was the first time in my life that I felt forgiven. Like I was saved. Like the frozen snow that's melted by spring, the tears wouldn't stop.
I love you!! Even if you go bald or like underage girls, I can handle it! I'm crazy with love!! (Young Kyoko talking to Tohru's fatherher husband)
A lot of people are too scared to admit that they're still children. They do everything they can to avoid it. So people who can admit that have a lot of courage.
I want to be the only one... who can help the one I care about.
Sometimes when I'd go to visit her in the hospital...she would purposely avoid me. Then I didn't know what she was thinking about anymore... (to Yuki, about Rin)

Shut up. Quit shouting like you're king of the figgin' world. You're making my ears bleed you bastard. Now I've got some common sense for you... If I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am. If I had no piercings, it wouldn't mean I'm nice and if my hair wasn't black, it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass! Who do you think you are anyway? You think you're God huh?! What's the matter?! Run out of things to say? No more advice?! You're not so hot anymore right now are you?! (Black Haru yelling at student council president for shouting at Momiji)
Don't you ever talk about Miss Honda that way again, you low life.
We've just witnessed a classic example of what I like to call "misdirected rage". Though I believe the technical term is being an ass.
Starting today... I'll be with you! I'll always be by your side! (to a young Kyo)
(to Kagura) Sorry that's your cue to say "Shigure you perv" and roll your eyes, slap me, whatever.
(thinking) Haru understood me. He cared for me. He loved me.
Another story of Fruits Basket manga has begun. I have something very important to tell everyone. Yuki is actually...A GIRL!
It would be so great if it was possible to go through life without making a single mistake.
Please stop adding to my misery. (to Ayame)

[To Kyo Sohma]If you think of someone's good qualities as the umeboshi in an onigiri, it's as if their qualities are stuck to their back! People around the world are like onigiri. Everyone has an umeboshi with a different shape and color and flavor. But because it's stuck on their back, they might not be able to see their umeboshi. "There's nothing special about me. I'm just white rice." [in her head] That's not true. There is an umeboshi -- on your back. [aloud] Maybe the reason people get jealous of each other, is because they can see so clearly the umeboshi on other people's backs. I can see them, too. I can see them perfectly. There's an amazing umeboshi on your back, Kyo-kun.
You're trying to break the curse. Stop it. What are you trying to do? Do you look down on us? Do you pity our wretched state? Don't bother! We never asked for your sympathy! (To Tohru)
If you love someone, they could make you sad. They could even make you feel lonely sometimes. But, that someone can also make you happier than you'll ever be.
Normally I hate people who whine all the time, but in your case... it would be okay to complain, be selfish and say what you want once in a while. It's okay to let yourself be sad.
If you don't let me see Rin... I'll kill myself! If I don't kill you, I'll kill myself! (to Akito)
How long are you gonna sit in front of me sobbing your little eyes out?! It's depressing! (To Tohru)
Skin him. Now. Barbeque the bastard!! (referring to Ayame)
[After Hatori asks what snow becomes when it melts]Ah...um, well...hmm. It becomes spring! No matter how cold it is now, spring will come again! Without fail. It's strange isn't it? But it's true.
Sometimes I think the whole world is conspiring to destroy my house.
Dammit! I'm fine, I just stepped in a hole.
Waah, Kyo's picking on me! (Repeated line)

You're so gullible! Don't you have any standards? So if I told you to spin around, you'd do it? If they told you to jump off a cliff, would you do that, too? I can't stand people who have no individuality!! (To Tohru)

If I were to live out life without any mistakes that would be great. But... there is no such path. Falling, tripping, losing the way, making mistakes, little by little, walking one step at a time, this is the only way to live out life.
I want to believe that life isn't full of darkness. Even if storms come to pass, the sun will shine again. No matter how painful and hard the rain my beat down on me.
You know... you really are something... (to Tohru)
High school girls, high school girls, all for me, high school girls!
Often times in memory, we have the tendency to overly romanticize the people we care about.
DON'T LEAVE ME!!
As long as you live things will keep happening! As long as you're alive wishes will keep being made!
Sometimes living can be hard! But it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry, and be happy!
If you don't protect that child, I will never forgive you! (referring to Tohru as she was talking to Kyo on the day of the accident)

It's just that I'm fighting the pain of lost love. I guess it's what you'd call a rude awakening... or, maybe... the weight of responsibility? But I'm fine. I'm fine. Caring for someone isn't based on logic. You can't really rationalize emotions. Once I think "I like him"... it's all over.
It's true, crying unexpectedly does make you feel better. When you're an adult you forget that.
(thinking) I can't stand up...on my own. I can't go...any further. Not...all by myself.
Stupid ocean!!! Ya want me to kill you? Huh??
Why don't you stop forcing yourself on him and calling it love? It's painful to watch (to Kagura about Kyo)
I was... relieved. I realized that, compared to the cat, I had it easy. (To kyo)
HANAJIMA, MY SPEAR! GET ME MY SPEAR!
[On first seeing Kyo] The ceiling... Is he hurt...? Wh-who... Well, hello, orange-head...
I don't think anyone is born knowing the reason why they're here. It's just something you have to find as you go along.
I HATE LEEKS!!!
A mystery... (Haru says this a lot, usually when it's not a mystery at all)
It's amazing no one's locked you up yet (to Shigure)

It's not always easy to see the good in people. In some people, you might even doubt that it's there at all. But if you can somehow, find a way to believe...sometimes that's all it takes to help someone, to give them the strength to find the good in themselves.

...As they played the game...I waited for someone to call "onigiri". But no one called. I was very little then. I had almost forgotten about that. But they knew...there would never be room for an onigiri...in a fruits basket.
I'm gonna take my place as a true member of this family!

I’m a complete failure. At everything I do, I’m absolutely worthless. I know this, and yet I continue to burden the human race with my presence. Every day I rob the world of valuable air by breathing. I’m a thief, and I hate myself for it. I don’t deserve to exist. But even though I know it’s the right thing to do, I’m such a useless coward. I don’t even have the courage to jump!
Something this, something that--jeez you're annoying. (to Yuki)

(referring to the letter for Kisa from the teacher) Here. It says to "like yourself". But good things about yourself... how are you supposed to find them? I only know things I hate about myself. 'Cause that's all I know, I hate myself. But even if you force yourself to find good things... it feels so empty. It doesn't work that way. People like your teacher just don't get it. I think... when you hear someone say they like you, for the first time... then you can begin to like yourself. I think when someone accepts you, for the first time... you feel like you can... forgive yourself a little. You can begin to face your fears... with courage.
Someday... no matter how cold it is now... the snow will melt. Without fail.
You don't look like you'd be endowned with something so great (To Tohru, referring to "womans intuition")
For there to be pain, there has to be kindness. For darkness to stand out, there has to be the sun.

It would be nice to live in a kind world without any fear, without any troubles, without hurting anybody, without ever being hurt; only doing the right thing. I wish I could reach this kind world by the shortest path possible.
Idiots should do what idiots can to be quicker.
Especially Yuki... He was my first love after all... [Tohru stops walking]
A sixth sense cannot make up for a total lack of common sense.

People aren't born social. Sure it comes easier to some people... but most people, like you, need to work at it. Some more than others. You're just inexperienced. For example, as a martial artist, you have the strength to break the table with your fist. But you also have the self-control to stop your fist right before it hits the table. You weren't born with that control, were you? You had to refine it. It's the same as interacting with people. But training for that isn't in the mountains - it has to be in town where people live. Mingling with people, hurting them, getting hurt by them. That's how you learn about people and about yourself. If you don't, you'll never care about anyone but yourself. You may be a black belt fighter, but you're still a white belt in dealing with people. For the sake of the girl who will one day tell you she loves you... Don't turn away. Keep training.
It's not the fun and games you think. It's bizarre... sinister... cursed. (speaking of the curse to Tohru)
I...think that my performance today was a success because he played opposite me. Kyo-kun...Thank you. (To Kazuma)
[thinking] I only take family as patients and I still get worked to death.

We’re searching for a reason of existence. With our own strength, because maybe the truth is that there’s no reason for life from the very beginning. Everyone hopes and tries so hard to find a reason of existence. The reason of birth, of staying with someone, of existence, believing we have to find them all with our own hands. Like finding a place for ourselves in dreams, in jobs, in people. The reasons we conclude may be indefinite and fragile. We may lose it too, but even so, we want a reason. As long as I’m alive, I want it too. If possible, I want to find a reason of existence within a person, within someone.

Why..? How can she say things like that so easily? If we hear that from our parents, what are we supposed to do? Rin thinks that she's been "bad". But who do you think is the one who's being "bad" here!?! Having people take their anger out on us, being laughed at, not being taken seriously. We kids get hurt just like you do! Why can't you understand something so simple?! Apologize! APOLOGIZE! APOLOGIZE TO RIN!! [Rin's mom shuts the door] HEY!! I TOLD YOU TO APOLOGIZE!!
Oh, you know... I'm gonna do this, and a little of that... and I'm definitely gonna do THAT...! (to Kyo about Tohru, after calling her Kyo's girlfriend)
I do love Akito... I love her then... I still do now.
Your happiness is in a much more vast world. Look for it. Find it. (to Hatsuharu)

My mom told me, it's better to trust people than to doubt them. She said that people aren't born with kind hearts. When we're born, all we have are desires for food and material things. Selfish instincts, I guess. But she said that kindness is something that grows inside of each person's body, but it's up to us to nurture that kindness in our hearts. That's why kindness is different for every person.
I'm ho-ome! Yuki-kun, Tohru-kun, I'm home! Oh, and let's not forget stupid-clumsy-Kyo-kun-who-lost-yet-another-fight!

However, I can't be happy. I feel I can't have that experience, I can't assume I will have that experience. I'm free, but feeling lonely and disheartened. I hope there's happiness out there. Besides, the future is approaching and waiting for me. In the future, I will be a part of the world. I will finally live my life.
I can't see Kyoko-san...anymore. But she left me something. Her advice, her feelings... and Tohru. They all... all become fertilizer to help me grow.
[To Kyo] Seriously... Must you break something every time you come home? When are you going to learn? You're too weak.
[referring to Tohru] If anyone can find a way to choke on rice, it's her.
I thought that, if I could shorten the distance between us, and if you would like me back, then the me that ran away - the dirty me - would be washed away. (To Kyo)
I don't need someone as unreliable as you for a partner! (To Tohru)
If it’s possible for one person to be hurt by another, then it’s possible for that person to be healed by another.

They say that we should love ourselves first, before other people learn to love us, but it's not as easy as it seems. Sometimes, we need someone to accept us and love us first, then we would learn to see ourselves through that person's eyes and learn to love our-self.
[After seeing Yuki, Shigure, and Kyo Sohma transform for the first time] THEY'RE ALL ANIMALS!

You're afraid to face what you know you must. So instead... you run away. The air that you said was smothering you... you know that it can also heal you. But you refuse to let it. You refuse to let anyone see you for your true self. You're too afraid of what you might lose. You're running away because you're afraid to admit your feelings even to yourself.
(thinking) I want Haru. I want all of him.
NOW, SPARKLE, MY HOUSE OF LEARNING!!

When you get anxious about the future, it is better not to think about it. The more you think about it the more anxious you'll get. Of course it's important to think about what lies ahead, too, but if you only look at what's down the road, you'll get tangled by the "laundry" by your feet and fall, won't you? You see, it's also important to think about what you can do now. What you can do today, and if you keep washing things one at a time, you'll be done before you know it. Sometimes the anxiety will start to well up, but when it does... take a little break. Read a book, watch tv, or eat soumen with everyone.
Even I... know what it's like to be jealous. (referring to Kureno and Akito's relationship)
Maybe I was lonely. Maybe I've just... always... been lonely.
I love you. When did I start to love you so much?
SHII-CHAN, YOU SON OF A BITCH!!!! (after learning that Shigure invited Akito to the summer house)
You reject your femininity... yet at the end here you are using it.
[To Tohru] Ever since you left I've been getting pissed off about everything, and because I couldn't understand why, it just pissed me off even more!
I have nothing but me. I'll give you myself. You can use me however you like for the rest of my life. (To Shigure)
Be selfish, say what you want once in a while. It's okay to let yourself be sad.

No one really starts out kind. All we know how to do at first is want. We want food, we want attention... It's just natural survival instinct, I guess... But kindness is something that we all have to learn as we go. It's something that grows and develops slowly over time... The same way our bodies do...
Don't try to be a hero, stupid cat. (to Kyo)
A woman who can talk tough while completely naked...amazing. (about Rin, the horse)

If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered." Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered.
I don't need you anymore. I'm tired of you. (To Haru)

But I think... I want to live with all my memories. Even if they're bad memories. Even if they're memories that only hurt me... that I'd rather forget. If I keep them and keep trying, without running away, then someday I'll be strong enough that those memories can't defeat me. I believe that because I want to think that there's no such thing as a memory that's ok to forget.

[To Ritsu Sohma] I'm sure that inside your heart...you're trying with all your might to find it on your own...the reason you were born. Because...because really...there might not be anyone who was born with a reason. I think that everyone might have to find one on their own. [in her head] A reason for being born... A reason that it's okay to be alive... A reason to exist. [aloud] I think everyone might have to find it themselves...and decide for themselves. It could be your dreams...your job...or a person. ...The reason you're looking for...might be vague, unclear...and uncertain. [in her head] And you might lose it. [aloud] But as long as you're alive...you have to keep searching for that reason.
[To Yuki] Liar! Moping around like a sad rat who lost his cheese!

Since when did the "Cat" set the rules for this house? You mean to tell me that you contribute more to this house than anyone else? Do you pay all the bills? I can't stand people who do absolutely nothing but complain all the time! (To Kyo)
Even I... know what it's like to be jealous.

We're all born with selfish desires so we can relate to those feelings in others. But kindness is created individually by each person... So it's easy to misunderstand when someone is trying to be kind to you... But, Tohru, people's differences are something to celebrate.
I don't want to be anyone's burden. I don't want you to be my dad if it's going to hurt you. (thinking about Kazuma)
If I wouldn't have tripped, you wouldn't have stopped, now would you?
But even though she's gone... she's not really gone, right? That the light won't go on in that apartment... is a lie, right?
STOP IMAGINING ME!
This may have been a useless time for you... but I really wanted to see you!
Is it okay for me to have my own life now, father, now that I'm not "special" anymore?
Tohru, I can't stand not being with you... I... because I love you.
Kyo-kun! Kyo-kun! I do love you, Kyo-kun! I love you!!!

Strangely enough, when you get older, the things you didn't understand when you were a child... start to make sense. "When this happened, I should have done that." "When that happened, I should have said this." Those types of things. You start to understand rather than regret. It may be closer to repentance. So it may be that I do want to repent and erase the ignorant self from my childhood. Maybe that's what they mean when they say adults are selfish.
Eventually, someday, whatever! If it will break, and we'll be free then that's good enough for me! (To Tohru)
Now I got some common sense for you,if I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am, if I had no piercings it wouldn't mean I'm nice, and if my hair was black it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass!
A conscience grows, just like the body. It's bred within your heart. That's why the shape of people's kindness is so different.
[in her head] My happiness comes from the kindness of those around me.
[To Kyo] Being away from everyone else may be lonely, but being away from you will be even lonelier.
Just as no matter how hard you try to keep it away, despair will attack you again and again. In the same manner, hope will return to you. Again and again.

So, what are you saying? You mean if your wife wasn't controlling you, you wouldn't be a villain? You mean you've never thought it's just because you're incompetent? And what's that supposed to mean anyway? (To the story, "Mogeta")

Pain, suffering. It's pointless to just think about those things. The traveler (referring to "The Most Foolish Traveler" by Natsuki Takaya) didn't. That may be stupid to some people but that's not stupid to me. Yuki... Kyo... when you close your eyes, what do you think?
It's over between Kana and me. We're not going to get back together. Even if we were together, I would only miss her... (To Shigure and Ayame)
I've gained freedom...and yet... it's so lonesome... (after declaring he was leaving Akito's side)
Yo... Are you ready for me to break your neck... Rat-boy?
Yo...time to pay the piper rat boy...I'm here to collect
A bond may seem like a beautiful thing from the outside...but if those involved see it as a burden, it's nothing but a shackle.
Kagura... Regardless of what your reason was, when you played with me...I was happy. Thanks. (To Kagura)
Ha ha! Eat my dust, rat-boy! (to Yuki)
[to Kyo after they trip] What can I learn from a stupid cat like you? You didn't even know that Jason isn't really a bear! He's a character from a horror film!
ou know you're a real wise ass, you know that?! (to Yuki)
[To Kyo] Perhaps if you'd just die you'd be reincarnated as something more pleasant.
Go ahead! I'll just turn you into the police for assaulting a minor! (To Kyo)
You pansy! What kind of girly punch is that? I didn't even feel it! (to Kyo)
I want to believe that memories, even sad and painful ones, should not be forgotten forever.
I want to possess her...to make her belong to me, and only me. (about Rin)
With so much at stake... are you willing to take the one in 10,000 chance?

[To Ritsu Sohma] Sometimes living can be hard, but it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry...be happy! [thinking] If that's not the reason for being born in this world...I don't know what is!
Please... even if I die surrounded by snow that never melts... please let her be happy.
It's you that I want. Do you not want me? Don't you want to be together? (to Rin)
It's a mystery. Just because of a simple sentence... I get shaken... or I get happy. Kyo-kun is mysterious indeed. (After Kyo says, "You wanna kill some time... with me?")
I still can't control my wish to see her. I never thought of how important she was to me. (about Rin)

Mom taught me that people's differences are something to celebrate. When I thought of all the different shapes of human kindness -- imagining them as round or square...I got really excited. Your kindness is like a candle Sohma-kun. I can feel it light up, and I just want to smile. It's that kind of kindness.
He's just...he's still a child. There are still a lot of things he can't give up. There's no rush. (To Ayame about Yuki)
I love you!! Even if you go bald or like underage girls, I can handle it! I'm crazy with love!! (Young Kyoko talking to Tohru's father/her husband)

However, I can't be happy. I feel I can't have that experience, I can't assume I will have that experience. I'm free, but feeling lonely and disheartened. I hope there's happiness out there. Besides, the future is approaching and waiting for me. In the future, I will be a part of the world. I will finally live my life.

If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, ""I persevered."" Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered.

When you get anxious about the future, it is better not to think about it. The more you think about it the more anxious you'll get. Of course it's important to think about what lies ahead, too, but if you only look at what's down the road, you'll get tangled by the ""laundry"" by your feet and fall, won't you? You see, it's also important to think about what you can do now. What you can do today, and if you keep washing things one at a time, you'll be done before you know it. Sometimes the anxiety will start to well up, but when it does... take a little break. Read a book, watch tv, or eat soumen with everyone.
It would be nice to live in a kind world without any fear, without any troubles, without hurting anybody, without ever being hurt

Since when did the ""Cat"" set the rules for this house? You mean to tell me that you contribute more to this house than anyone else? Do you pay all the bills? I can't stand people who do absolutely nothing but complain all the time! (To Kyo)

So, what are you saying? You mean if your wife wasn't controlling you, you wouldn't be a villain? You mean you've never thought it's just because you're incompetent? And what's that supposed to mean anyway? (To the story, ""Mogeta"")

Strangely enough, when you get older, the things you didn't understand when you were a child... start to make sense. ""When this happened, I should have done that."" ""When that happened, I should have said this."" Those types of things. You start to understand rather than regret. It may be closer to repentance. So it may be that I do want to repent and erase the ignorant self from my childhood. Maybe that's what they mean when they say adults are selfish.

Pain, suffering. It's pointless to just think about those things. The traveler (referring to ""The Most Foolish Traveler"" by Natsuki Takaya) didn't. That may be stupid to some people but that's not stupid to me. Yuki... Kyo... when you close your eyes, what do you think?
(to Kagura) Sorry that's your cue to say ""Shigure you perv"" and roll your eyes, slap me, whatever.
You don't look like you'd be endowned with something so great (To Tohru, referring to ""womans intuition"")
We've just witnessed a classic example of what I like to call ""misdirected rage"". Though I believe the technical term is being an ass.
I yearn for you more than anyone else. I love you Akito... And that is the irrevocable unwavering truth.(shigures answer to akitos question ""do you like me?"" during a child hood flashback)

Ah, I'm sorry, I guess this is farewell. Let Tohru find happiness. Please by many people let her be loved. If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, ""I persevered"". Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered. (Part of Kyoko's last words that were never said)
Is it okay for me to have my own life now, father, now that I'm not ""special"" anymore?

Why..? How can she say things like that so easily? If we hear that from our parents, what are we supposed to do? Rin thinks that she's been ""bad"". But who do you think is the one who's being ""bad"" here!?! Having people take their anger out on us, being laughed at, not being taken seriously. We kids get hurt just like you do! Why can't you understand something so simple?! Apologize! APOLOGIZE! APOLOGIZE TO RIN!! [Rin's mom shuts the door] HEY!! I TOLD YOU TO APOLOGIZE!!

It's just that I'm fighting the pain of lost love. I guess it's what you'd call a rude awakening... or, maybe... the weight of responsibility? But I'm fine. I'm fine. Caring for someone isn't based on logic. You can't really rationalize emotions. Once I think ""I like him""... it's all over.

...As they played the game...I waited for someone to call ""onigiri"". But no one called. I was very little then. I had almost forgotten about that. But they knew...there would never be room for an onigiri...in a fruits basket.
It's a mystery. Just because of a simple sentence... I get shaken... or I get happy. Kyo-kun is mysterious indeed. (After Kyo says, ""You wanna kill some time... with me?"")

(referring to the letter for Kisa from the teacher) Here. It says to ""like yourself"". But good things about yourself... how are you supposed to find them? I only know things I hate about myself. 'Cause that's all I know, I hate myself. But even if you force yourself to find good things... it feels so empty. It doesn't work that way. People like your teacher just don't get it. I think... when you hear someone say they like you, for the first time... then you can begin to like yourself. I think when someone accepts you, for the first time... you feel like you can... forgive yourself a little. You can begin to face your fears... with courage.

[To Kyo Sohma]If you think of someone's good qualities as the umeboshi in an onigiri, it's as if their qualities are stuck to their back! People around the world are like onigiri. Everyone has an umeboshi with a different shape and color and flavor. But because it's stuck on their back, they might not be able to see their umeboshi. ""There's nothing special about me. I'm just white rice."" [in her head] That's not true. There is an umeboshi -- on your back. [aloud] Maybe the reason people get jealous of each other, is because they can see so clearly the umeboshi on other people's backs. I can see them, too. I can see them perfectly. There's an amazing umeboshi on your back, Kyo-kun.
Sometimes all people need is a good listener.
You're lucky Al. Since your body's huge.
You see, I'm sure we can change, because we're weak. And because we die. We have to fight in order to live, and that is what will make us strong.
Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
There are some things that can only be conveyed through words.
I can't tell you that… You have to figure it out. Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs. So get up and use them. You're strong enough to make your own path.
Look straight at the people you kill; don't take your eyes off them for a second. And don't ever forget them because they won't forget you.

Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value 
of living.
Wrong, holy man. All we want is to get our bodies normal again. See, we don't lie about what's possible. We didn't start a cult.
I'm as normal as they come and this is a contest of freaks! What do you want me to do, shoot my slingshot at him?
Hughes, just a bit of advice. The soldiers who never shut up about their girls back home... They don't make it.
I hate deserts. It's nothing but sand. *collapses* If there was some grass, I could turn it into bread. I'm starving! Huh? Hey! Al, where'd you go? Al? Hey!
We're all lost... That's why we're sad.
Maybe you are right. Where did I come from and where will I go? When I die? Maybe all this time that is what I wanted: the freedom to find out.
What could be more beautiful than doing work that puts your soul at risk, because that's what it means to be alive!
Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there, that lives outside of ourselves and our dreams.
*referring to Alphonse* This pain's nothing...compared to what he's given up...
*spits out his juice* I don't think so, pops! Do I look like a clown to you?!

Alchemy: The science of understanding the structure of matter, breaking it down, then reconstructing it as something else. It can even make gold from lead. But alchemy is a science, so it must follow the natural laws: To create, something of equal value must be lost. This is the principle of Equivalent Exchange. But on that night, I learned the value of some things can't be measured on a simple scale. My brother and I knew the laws of science, of Equivalent Exchange, that gain required sacrifice, that something had to be taken from us. But we thought there was nothing more we could lose. We were wrong.
Hughes again? Put him through. It's me. I won't listen if you're going to be bragging about your daughter. *...* Hughes? Hughes... Hey! Hughes! Hughes!!

Killed in action and promoted two ranks for it. Brigadier General Hughes. You were the guy who was supposed to work below me and to push me to the top. Then you get yourself killed and surpass me in the ranks. I don't know what's more absurd, You or the State.
There are some things in life that will only be understood through words.
But you're thinking on too large a scale there, kid... If we don't want to drive ourselves crazy, we can only deal with what's directly in front of us.
Come down here and face me, you third-rate fraud. I'll show you there's no comparison between us!
I will do what I can, even if my chance of passing is minuscule, if that will allow me to move forward.
I sunk again. *after sinking in the desert*
*to Edward* So, you hooked up with your mechanic, huh? Not too shabby, sprout.

A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart... A Fullmetal Heart.
[telling Mustang about the investigation on Scar] His bloodstained clothes washed up further downstream. We don't know if that means that he's dead, or just naked.

You want to bring back someone that you've lost. You might want money. Maybe you want women. Or, you might want to protect the world. These are all common things people want. Things that their hearts desire. Greed may not be good, but it's not so bad, either. You humans think greed is just for money and power! But everyone wants something they don't have.
It's true, I don't have a body, but I'm here. This is my punishment for setting foot on holy ground where mortals are forbidden. We made a mistake, Rose, and we're paying for it.
WHO ARE YOU CALLING A MOUSY LITTLE PIPSQUEAK?!
Dedication is a talent all on its own.
I think people should try to ignore their race, and just treat each other as equals.
For one that turns against God to come in person to receive judgement... Today is a good day!

Yeah, it's still a nameless sniper. It's become quite a topic among us. She's still a cadet from the military academy, but at any rate she's got a good arm. It seems she's been brought all the way out here. Hah... to think they have to pull out even a little chick like that... this must be the end.

Ah... what a beautiful sound. It doesn't get any better than that. I can feel it deep in my bones, like a part of me I never noticed before. That sound is an extension of my being. And this land - this land that's governed by death - I will paint it red with this shard of destruction.

Everything we see, everyone we meet, is caught up in a great unseen flow. But it's bigger than that. It's the entire world, the entire universe even. And compared to something as big as that, Al, you and I are tiny, not even the size of ants. Only one small part within a much greater flow. Nothing more than a fraction of the whole. But by putting all those "ones" together, you get one great "All", just like Teacher said. The flow of this universe follows laws of such magnitude that you and I can't even imagine them.
You think surrendering, and offering yourself will stop the war? How arrogant. The life of each human is worth one, that's it. Nothing more, nothing less.

When you notice an insect on the ground, do you stop to consider it a fool? The life of an insect is so beneath you that it would be a waste of your time to even consider judging it. That would be an accurate summation of my feelings towards you, humans.
The death of a culture, is the death of a people.
You can't change reality, just your perception!
If a man will not work, he shall not eat.
*referring to Armstrong taking off his shirt* Did he have to strip?..

When you live, your life will end sooner or later. The body will return to the earth. Grass and flowers will grow on top of it. The soul will nourish the hearts... and it will live on in the hearts of other people. Everything in this world flows around and circulates. That goes for human lives too.
Babies aren't born after just 5 months!
Maybe life has no equal trade, maybe you can give up all you got, and get nothing back. Even if I can't prove it's true, I have to try, for your sake, Al.
On the day we left, we burned down the family home and all the familiar things inside. Because some memories aren't meant to leave traces.
Our names are given to us by God. I have betrayed God, and so I no longer have a name.
You know, it's funny. Every crook I meet wants to tell me how much I'm just like them. But there's a big difference between you and me and the burdens we bear.
A king is no king without his people. But people without a king are lost as well!
Master Sergeant Fuery, during your last physical it was discovered you have Athletes Foot, and we now believe it is affecting your brain.
Nobody calls me a pipsqueak and gets away with it! Not even a little girl!
Save your breath. The laws of alchemy don't justify murder!
What pride... are you saying that you are God's equal?
If your opponent is of choleric temper, seek to irritate.
CHILDBIRTH'S NOT ALCHEMY, YOU DOPE!
It was just a rebound! Don't make a big deal over one or two arms!
Okay, here's the plan: We go in, start hitting people, and see where it takes us.
Revenge that involves unrelated people isn’t valid at all. All he’s doing is hiding his vengeful hate with the title of God’s representative and acting sublime.
They don't call me Greed for nothing! I want money, I want women, status and power! I want everything this world's selling and eternity's topping the list!
No matter what, if you intend to interfere, I will eliminate you too.
Told you, Rose. Get too close to the sun, and you'll burn.

Of course! Dogs embody loyalty, they follow their master's commands above all else! Be a jerk to them and they don't complain, and they never once beg for a paycheck! Trust me Fuery, they're the great servants of man! *singing* Loyal canine how we salute thee! *laughs maniacally*
When I become Fuhrer President, all female personnel in the military ... will have to wear mini-skirts.
I am an instrument of divine judgment!
I have no use for a religion that's been forsaken by its own god.
It's like that myth about the hero... He made wings out of wax so he could fly... but when he got too close to the sun... to God... the wax melted and he crashed to the ground...
I never feel more human than when I'm fighting real monsters.
I lost my pawns, my knight, my rook, my bishop, and even my queen. But, it's not checkmate, just yet.
Whoever invented stew is brilliant! It has milk in it and it still tastes good.
WHO ARE YOU CALLING A RUNT SO TINY HE COULD ONLY BE SEEN WITH A MAGNIFYING GLASS, YOU JERK!
Ed believes he saved that town, it's one of the first successes he's had. I'll let him keep thinking that for a while. He'll learn the truth soon enough: we always do.
I'm not short! I'm fun-sized!

The Philosopher's Stone: those who possess it, no longer bound by the laws of equivalent exchange in alchemy, can gain without sacrifice...create without equal exchange. We searched for it... and we found it.
Don't kid yourself, Mustang. You know how humans love to watch other people suffer while making fools of themselves. I mean, why else would you constantly be at war with each other?

We really are weak creatures, but that's why we can strive to become stronger. Even if you feel it's useless, each step we take leads to something great. That's why I'm sure we'll be able to change. Because we're weak... and because death is inevitable. Humans try their best to live and end up becoming stronger.
Foolish alchemists who have turned their backs on the ways of God...shall all be punished.
Dad left... A long time ago, when brother and I were still boys. Mom stared off into the distance a lot. But she carried on as if nothing were wrong.
Those people had us dancing right in the palms of their hands, didn't they? I guess it doesn't matter what we do. We'll never be the ones in control.
If there's no door, then I'll make one!

This body comes with many inconveniences. But inconveniences don't make me miserable! There is no reason for you to pity me! My life was put back together with alchemy by my brother. If I deny myself, that would mean I'm denying my brother, along with alchemy. I believe in the potential that alchemy holds. I want to believe in it!
Destruction and creation are two sides of the same coin! You must destroy to create! That is the law of the universe!

Water, 35 litres. Carbon, 20 kg. Ammonia, 4 litres. Lime, 1.5 kg. Phosphorus, 800 g. Salt, 250 g. Niter, 100 g. Sulphur, 80 g. Fluoride, 7.5 g. Iron, 5 g. Silicon, 3g. And fifteen other elements. Those are the elements to make an average adult human body. You can buy these elemental ingredients at the market with the pocket money of a child. Humans are made so cheaply.
War does not determine who is right - only who is left.

The power of one man doesn't amount to much. But, however little strength I'm capable of, I'll do everything humanly possible to protect the people I love, and in turn they will protect the ones they love. It seems like the least we tiny humans can do for each other.
You clearly have nerves of steel. But, I'd say you still have much to learn about the world.

I've been thinking about this for a long time. We put all our trust in alchemy but in the end... what is it? "Alchemy is the science of understanding the flow of matter and its laws. The process of comprehension, deconstruction, and reconstruction. The world flows too. It must also follow laws. Everything circulates. Even death is a part of that circulation. You must accept the flow." Hmm, Teacher sure drummed that into our heads, didn't she? I thought I understood it. But I don't understand anything... Mom proves that. Now here I am again, trying desperately to figure out a way to do the impossible. I'm such a hopeless idiot. All this time and I haven't grown up one bit. I thought maybe the rain would wash away some of this gloom that's been following me... but right now, every drop that hits my face is even more depressing.
Don't give alcohol to minors!
A bratty little midget.

[To Lan Fan] Brat, quit blabbering on about trifling topics such as love and sadness. Don't underestimate us. She's the woman I chose. A will is unnecessary between us. That's usually how it is between a King and his companion.
The heroes during times of war, are nothing but mass murderers during times of peace.
Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves and our dreams.
What do I have to live for now that I know Cain won't come back? You tell me that, Ed!
Yeah, I get it. You couldn't see me since I'm so short, you couldn't distinguish me from all the grains of sand. VERY FUNNY!!
*on the phone* I'm sorry to interrupt you, Major, but let me offer a bit of feminine advice. BABIES AREN'T BORN AFTER JUST FIVE MONTHS!

Memories... of the people we were. They're subtle, but they're real. It took me a lot of time to understand what I saw. Books say we shouldn't have memories. Or at least that they're only the memories and emotions of the alchemists who made us. But they are wrong. Those memories are mine.

[To Father] You've certainly mellowed out... you used to be fun, full of life and emotion. Lust, Greed, Sloth, Gluttony, Envy, Wrath, and Pride. Of course, excessive want will destroy anyone, but those same desires are necessary to understand what it means to be human. Why did you rid yourself of them?
Like I always say, can't find a door? Make your own.
Some memories... aren't meant to leave traces.
Come on now. Is that anyway to talk to your new boss, landlord, and all-around overseer?

*grabs two citizens and swings them around in a circle* Shorty?! Could a shorty do this?! What else you want to call me: a half-pint bean-sprout midget?! I'm still growing you backwater desert idiots!
Even with your stones, I'm on a whole other level!

[To Envy] Now I see. You're Jealous. You're jealous of humans, aren't you? According to you, humans are supposed to be a lot weaker than Homunculi. And yet, even if they get discouraged after being beaten, and even if they get close to falling down after losing their paths, they continue to get up and fight. Everyone around them helps them get back up. And you're envious of that.
Do you think it's possible to send Flame Alchemy through the phone and burn someones ears off?

"I long to see someone who died", "I want to be rich", "I want women", "I want to protect the world"... They're all desires. In other words, wishes. If you ask me, there's neither "right" or "wrong" when it comes to greed. You humans go around ranking certain types of greed in order from good to bad, which makes you so hard to understand.
There's no way I'm dying before you do, you morally bankrupt Colonel with a God complex.
Hey, mutt! I need exercise, so I'll play with you!
I think you've got me all wrong. My motives aren't so sophisticated as "revenge" or "honor" or any of that... The reason I killed all of those men... was because I could. It's that simple.
The moment a soldier dons his uniform, he accepts that he might be buried in it.

I don't know if we chose the right path, brother. But I do know this: I don't want to be in this suit anymore. I want to feel things again. It's strange. We've been right beside each other all this time. But I can't remember what your skin feels like, or how you smell.
Don't look away, Rose! You need to see what happens when you try to bring a human to life, when you cross into God's territory or whatever the hell it is! Is this what you want?! Look!!

If the ways of this world are based on equivalent exchange, as alchemy says, then in order to allow for a new generation to enjoy good fortune, the price that we must pay, is to carry the bodies of the dead across a river of blood.

Men are not men on the battlefield. We turn into some other creature. You can do the cruelest things... It doesn't even matter if it's an order or not. To protect yourself, your mind shuts out any emotions you have. It's like a steel door. But once the war is over, you can't keep it closed forever.
They weren't my friends, they were my possessions! Money, women, henchmen... they're all possessions! So killing my henchmen is the same as stealing from me, and I don't let people take what's mine!
Are you telling me to go back and put a corpse on trial?
If there is such a thing as the work of the devil, then there's no doubt it's what happened in this incident.
Greed may not be good, but it’s not so bad either. You humans think greed is just for money or power, but everyone wants something they can’t have.

AHA-HA-HA! Alchemists are scientists. We don't believe in unprovable concepts like "God". *Rose looks angry* We strive to uncover the principles of creation in the matter of the world, to pursue truth... *gazes at Leto statue* it's ironic that we scientists... who don't believe in God... are in a sense the closest things to him.
A man who inflicts suffering can't rest. His guilty mind won't allow it. But today, I can finally close my eyes to the living nightmare. And lay down, knowing that I won't wake again.
There are always things more important than someone's dream...
Appearances rarely share the whole truth.
Even a piece of garbage has its pride.
You combined animals, the most depraved kind of alchemy there is.

The great flow that maintains the universe, call it the cycle of life, the course of nature each one of us is just a small part of that part. One in the all. Yet without all the individual ones, the all can't exist. This world flows by following grander laws that we can't even imagine. To recognize that flow, to work in it. To decompose, and recreate, that is alchemy.
Sun, it's just a mass of hydrogen... Get too close to it and all you do is burn.
A Gun is Good. Unlike A sword or a knife, it doesn't leave the feeling of a person dying in your hands.

People can say there is a balance, a logic that everything happens for a reason... But the truth is far less designed. No matter how hard you work, when you die, you die. Some spend their entire life trying to scratch their way to the top, and still die in poverty. While others are born into wealth without ever working at all. It's a cruel and random world. And yet the chaos is all so beautiful.
Love for the dead is pointless. We fight to keep them alive, that is all.
A normal guy like me isn't going to be part of some "believe it or not" episode with nutcases like you guys!

Any man who has the brains to think and the nerve to act for the benefit of the people of the country, is considered a radical, by those who are content with stagnation and willing to endure disaster.
You can call me Roy Mustang, or just Lieutenant Colonel. Hell, you can call me the Flame Alchemist. Whatever you do, remember the pain.
Attention, gun-toting extremists! Can you hear me all right, or did you blow your ears out playing target practice?
I'm not short, I just live in a big world.
You're not a good-for-nothing person. I think that being able to try your hardest to be something is a talent by itself.
DON'T CALL ME SMALL! I'LL BREAK DOWN YOUR FEET AND STICK THEM ON YOUR HEAD!!

In general, men prefer to let their actions speak instead of words. When they're in pain, they don't want to burden anyone with it, not if they can help it. They don't want anyone to worry about them. That's how they are. Even so, there may come a time when they'll ask for your help. And when they do, I know that you'll be there for them. Isn't that enough?
By the way, I don't get my skills from a pocketwatch.
*to Edward* There's something disturbing about having to be in your debt...
WHO ARE YOU CALLING SO SMALL YOU WANNA CRUSH LIKE AN ANT?!
Even your gravest mistakes shouldn't stop you from moving forward.
Open your eyes. "God" is nothing more than a construct created by man to inspire fear and promote order.
How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?
No fair, sky. I'm the one who feels like crying.
There's no such thing as no such thing.
*referring to Winry* I didn't know she could be so cute.

In order to obtain something, there must be something of equal value. It is the Law of Conservation in Alchemy. Back then, we believed that it was the truth of the world. However, the real world isn’t perfect, so there is not just a single law that governs everything that happens within it. It is the same for the Law of Conservation in Alchemy. Even so, I believe that people cannot obtain something without paying a price. The pain we felt was surely enough of a price to pay. And anyone who pays the price known as hard work surely gains something. The Law of Conservation is not the law governing this 
world. Until the day I meet with him again, that is the promise… Ni-san and I made.
How can you move forward if you keep regretting the past?
I'm not short! I'm fun-sized!

Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost. That is alchemy's first law of equivalent exchange. In those days, we really believed that to be the world's one and only truth.
Oh this is perfect! Now my arm's fallen off too! Today is a terrible day!
Awww!! There are just so many people whose asses I have to kick!

*Ed crawling through an air vent* Che. It's so tight, it makes me glad that I have a small body. 
........................ 
Shit! I just admitted I'm small!
Stand up and walk... Move on... After all, you have perfect legs to stand on...

*Ed crawling through an air vent* Che. It's so tight, it makes me glad that I have a small body. 
........................ 
Shit! I just admitted I'm small!
I'm not short! I'm fun-sized!
Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves and our dreams.
Master Sergeant Fuery, during your last physical it was discovered you have Athletes Foot, and we now believe it is affecting your brain.

In general, men prefer to let their actions speak instead of words. When they're in pain, they don't want to burden anyone with it, not if they can help it. They don't want anyone to worry about them. That's how they are. Even so, there may come a time when they'll ask for your help. And when they do, I know that you'll be there for them. Isn't that enough?
Okay, here's the plan: We go in, start hitting people, and see where it takes us.

I long to see someone who died"", ""I want to be rich"", ""I want women"", ""I want to protect the world""... They're all desires. In other words, wishes. If you ask me, there's neither ""right"" or ""wrong"" when it comes to greed. You humans go around ranking certain types of greed in order from good to bad, which makes you so hard to understand.
Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value

Everything we see, everyone we meet, is caught up in a great unseen flow. But it's bigger than that. It's the entire world, the entire universe even. But by putting all those ""ones"" together, you get one great ""All"", just like Teacher said. The flow of this universe follows laws of such magnitude that you and I can't even imagine them.

I've been thinking about this for a long time. We put all our trust in alchemy but in the end... what is it? ""Alchemy is the science of understanding the flow of matter and its laws. The process of comprehension, deconstruction, and reconstruction. The world flows too. It must also follow laws. Everything circulates. Even death is a part of that circulation. You must accept the flow."" Hmm, Teacher sure drummed that into our heads, didn't she? I thought I understood it. But I don't understand anything... Mom proves that. Now here I am again, trying desperately to figure out a way to do the impossible. I'm such a hopeless idiot. All this time and I haven't grown up one bit. I thought maybe the rain would wash away some of this gloom that's been following me... but right now, every drop that hits my face is even more depressing.
