quote: To a girl, a man who’s nice to everyone... hm, I suppose that works as an example, to a man, it would be like a woman who opens her legs to anyone. People want companions so they can swiftly satisfy their need for love and affection. A woman wants a man who only shows his love to her.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Did you know? If a colony of ants gets rid of the laziest one, another one will just start being lazy instead?
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Girls are happier when they're the only one you're nice to.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: More than anyone else, humanity is a species which looks forward to tomorrow. Because of their dreams, they can bear with the unjustness of the present.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: If you can't see something through the end, then don't do anything.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Only humans, with their short lifespan, are driven to solve every problem they encounter. It is how they live.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Some questions with no answers cannot be answered even by those who live forever. Yet, the absence of a correct answer does not mean the question cannot be answered. If you want to know how I felt about the complete ban on some culture and art that I could not understand, was not interested in, or could not accept, in the name of preventing the violations of others’ rights or other trumped up charges, I believe that would be taking us onto the road of discriminating against others. If we define culture as that which is healthy or humane, and defend that decision in the name of justice, once any part of that system collapses, it will cause an unimaginable number of problems for society. For instance, if I drew a line in the middle and erased one side, the next day, a new line will appear in the middle of the side that is left. I think suppressing the instincts and thoughts of the human spirit is bad. The desire for purity and wholesomeness, when taken to an extreme, is harmful.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: People can't live for the future without accepting reality.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: A mission's one thing, but I can't put them in danger for personal reasons. The only life I can do that to is my own.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: It is a shame for a knight to have one's trust in him withdrawn halfway.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: If you don’t have the resolve to take responsibility for her until the very end, then don’t do anything unnecessary.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Ruling over death means ruling over life. Death is the climax of life. To have the best death, you must honor life.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Revenge is a rite that restores one’s spirit after it has been ravaged by the anger and hatred of loss. That is the only way to heal one's soul and stand up again to face reality. That is the only way we can have a tomorrow.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: Someone who can be deceived by others will be deceived again and again.
anime: Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite Kaku Tatakaeri

quote: In this small universe, it's an endless cycle of winning and losing until you begin losing your mind.
After all the hiding your true self, even if you eventually become popular, won't you just feel exhausted by it in the end?
I don't care if you're the son of the president or what. That just shows the success of your father. It doesn't mean you are excellent too.
Love is nothing more than a cultural idea attached to our pre-existing genetic needs to reproduce and gain recognition from our peers.
A garden retains its beauty as long as it is tended to and cared for. Life in general, is the same. Once it becomes pretty, it mustn't go back to being the primitive mess it started out as.
A barbarian punches someone when he feels like it, a soldier attacks when it's time to attack, and Ikta Solork says everything he wants whenever he wants to say it.
Chasing someone is tiring, and being chased is mentally exhausting. But making someone chase you can be fun.

People started growing crops because going hunting without knowing if you'd catch anything was a pain. People dug wells because going all the way to the river was a pain. Laziness is the mother of human progress.
I'll give you some wise words, Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork.
If you think unconditional kindness is good, and any sort of kindness that comes with conditions is hypocrisy, you should reconsider. People can only achieve as much as the situation allows.
There is nothing more expensive than something free.
If you don't know what state you wounds are in, of where you're hurting if you don't know that for yourself, there's no point in trying to share it with others, is there?
It's okay if you don't understand, just stay with me, watch me, and slowly come to understand.

It's because we don't unterstand! It's because we don't unterstand that we wonder what the other is thinking and try desperately to unterstand every word they say... You end up thinking too much about the other person, and being close to them becomes painful so you try to distance yourself... I believe you become friends with somebody by doing that over and over, and that's how... As much as I hate to admit it, it's how I became friends with these guys.
Nobody knows what will happen in the future. Something even better might happen tomorrow.
Everybody has things they aren't good at or can't do. We cover each other's weakness. That's what a party's for.
There are wounds that even magic can't heal, but... even though it was painful to hear you talk about it, it was okay. That part was okay.

You said that she's no different from us, right? So if we don't try to get to know her, she won't try to get to know us either. If we don't treat her as a friend, she won't treat us as her friends either, right?

If we had spent more time together, maybe I would have seen another side of him. I wish I knew him more. I wish I knew more about what kind of person he was. I wanted more time. If we had more time, we would've gone through things together. Maybe we would've gotten annoyed at each other and fight. Maybe we would've disliked each other, or liked each other more.

I understand the pain of losing a comrade. I've experienced it, too. Please do not forget the pain. You will move forward while holding on to that pain. Please treasure the comrades you have now. Once they are gone, they will not return. Usually, you don't realize this until afterwards.
Are our enemies the kobolds? No, our real enemies are our overly weak selves.
It's a battle of life and death, and I'm still alive! So I'm not going to give up, and I'll keep living. I'll keep living until I die.
Don't sweat the small stuff. You'll only tire yourself out.
I'm a man who makes precise choices about time, place, and people. Pleople call me Master of Choices. I'm gonna be the King of the Choices!
If you guys weren't here, I don't know what would have happened to me. You can't live in this world alone, no matter how you look at it.
After today, tomorrow will come again. Maybe I've been taking that for granted. But now... It's not easy, huh...
As for me, I have a lot of things that I'm not good at and that I need to work on. My comrades make up for those weaknesses by help me out, and maybe that's how we've found a balance in our party.
Okay. I will protect all of you. I will never let another friend die.
Why do we have to be okay being friends with someone who won't treat us as friends?
I'm the one who is grateful. That's because you're all willing to be my friends. For that, I'm grateful.
We fall into a routine and make careless mistakes because of that. Maybe it'd be good for us to have some excitement or be under pressure once in a while.

It seems like we spent a long time together, but it wasn't. It was actually pretty short. Too short. So I kind of know, but I kind of don't know what I want to say. He was friendly, easy to talk to, and smart. He could do anything and was reliable. I thought he was perfect. But maybe I just didn't realize what his faults were. He might have been hiding his flaws.
Living has it own challenges. I'll give you just one piece of advice. Don't quit. Yes, when you die, you die. But if you give up, you're definitely going to die. That, I am sure of.
I now have things that I don't want to forget, and things that I shouldn't forget. And I don't plan to ever forget those things, as long as I live.
I'm different from who I was yesterday. I wonder what I will be like tomorrow. Day by day, we live in the today and keep living to meet our future selves.

The more battles we fought, the more our confidence grew. We weren't afraid of anything back then. But the difference between victory and defeat is paper-thin. We didn't realize this and were arrogant.
I know we can't immediately treat her as part of our group, but if we always think of her as an outsider, she'll never have a chance to become part of our group.
It doesn't matter what you were like before. Nobody cares.
So now we know her past. So what? It doesn't have anything to do with us. We have to be nice to her just because she's had a rough past? You've got to be kidding.
If you have enough breath to say you don't have energy, I haven't push you far enough!

Yeah, we've become friends. When you're in the same party, there will be times when things don't go smoothly, when you get angry, and when you fight. But they really are your precious friends. It doesn't matter why you became friends, but that you are friends at this moment.
We should be driven by things like our desires, instincts, and impulses. That's how it should be.
It's not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what's realistic.

Heroes and villains both thrive on violence, but we're still categorized. "You're good." "You're evil." That's how it is!! Symbol of peace? Hah!! In the end you're just a tool for violence, made to keep us down! And violence only breeds more violence.
The most inflated egos are often the most fragile.
The slight difference between those who always aim for the top and those who don't... It'll come to matter in a big way once you all emerge into society.
When there's nothing to be gained, rising to the challenge at those times... is surely the mark... of a true hero!!
If you feel yourself hitting up against your limit remember for what cause you clench your fists... remember why you started down this path, and let that memory carry you beyond your limit.

They've been exposed to the outside world, up close and personal. They've had that fear planted in them. And they've endured it. Overcome it. Each has grown from that experience... and forgotten how to hesitate.
People... are not born equal. That's the hard truth I learned at age four. But that... was my first and last setback.
Whether you win or lose... You can always come out ahead by learning from the experience.

Heroes and villains both thrive on violence, but we're still categorized. ""You're good."" ""You're evil."" That's how it is!! Symbol of peace? Hah!! In the end you're just a tool for violence, made to keep us down! And violence only breeds more violence.

Being angry consumes energy and makes me tired. So I'd rather apologize, even if I'm not at fault. Besides, we get along, and we both want to stay friends. Prolonging an awkward situation out of stubbornness is just silly.
Then, if he accepts who you are, it doesn't matter if you're perfect for him or not. Rather, he may prefer you just the way you are now.

The weather's nice and the breeze feels good. The little birds are making their cute chirping sounds. Perhaps people nowadays have forgotten how wonderful nature is... Yes, don't you think it's a waste to not feel it with your entire body like this?
Old techniques created by others will never be your own. Only what you create and experience for yourself can become your own.
People who can get back on their feet after learning their weaknesses are strong and admirable.

Even if all the confidence and pride you've built over the years is blown to pieces by a major failure, even if you've had a soul-crushing experience, you still have to open the shop the next day. That's who chefs are.
anime: Shokugeki no Sōma: Ni no Sara

quote: Once in a while when I wake up, I find myself crying. The dream I must’ve had, I can never seem to recall...But the sensation that I’ve lost something lingers for a long time after I wake up.

If I suddenly showed up, would I bother him? Surprise him? There’s no way we could meet. But what if we did? What should I do? Would I annoy him? Would it be awkward? Or maybe… He’d be a bit glad to see me?
I wanted to tell you that… Wherever you may end up in this world, I will be searching for you.
Treasure the experience. Dreams fade away after you wake up.
Why does the scenery of a town that no longer exists wring my heart so?
In romance, you tend to end up looking for someone who resembles you.
Lies are told prevent yourself from getting hurt.

All adults are the same in the end. At first they are kind and sympathetic to make you drop your guard, then they try to kill you if you don't do as they say. That how adults always are. They're losers. The damn bastards!
Don't do something wasteful as to wash your frustrations with tears. Your frustration is motivation that you can use to make yourself better. Hold it inside like it's an important thing!
Mankind is a very intresting species.
Accomplishing a shared goal under tense circumstances causes distance between people to naturally close.

When you aim to reach high places, you may find yourself on narrow footing and feel disheartened. And then your confidence will falter, and you will find it ever harder to believe in yourself. If you ever feel that you can't believe in yourself, please believe in your friends.

At times, you will probably lose sight of your life goals, as well. When that happens, instead of panicking, why not try indulging in a hobby? Then a new, or perhaps an old, goal might grow stronger, and stronger, into a rousing fortissimo.
I'm here because I don't like to be tied down. So you should decide for yourself who you want for your friend.
If I have to win through underhanded means, I'd rather just stand right here until I die.

When faced with a decision... At such times, we must choose only one option and it can be very confusing. When that happens, simply using your head and charging straight into the obstacle is a fine option.
Even if they're only a year older, shouldn't we respect and serve our elders?
I understand now... What I really need to protect isn't myself, much less my money. It's my pride.
If you have no money, I believe all you can do is work.
Don't you think forcing people to help with something pointless is far more cruel?
Have a dream that you can achieve within your lifetime!
However rough the waters in the outside world may be, to find your own lighthouse and swim for it is only logical, isn't it?
Looking back on the past is a dangerous thing. It's nothing more than an attachment.
A real man never goes back on his words!
One face is given to us by God. The other - we make ourselves.
Miracles are illusions caused by insufficient observation and understanding. They're just... glorious misunderstandings.
You should try persuasion when people are mentally defenseless. The fascist who proposed that was a demonic genius.
If you endure too much, it'll be your loss.
Sometimes things go badly, even if nobody really did anything wrong.
What are you so hesitant about? It’s your dream, isn’t it? It’s right in front of you and you’re wavering? You gotta be reckless, and take whatever you can!

Please don’t apologize. If you did, and I forgave you, then it’d be like it was all a lie. I want to hold those memories we had dear. The fun times… The painful times… All of it. So please, don’t apologize.
Isn’t there something strange in becoming friends because you’re asked? Friends aren’t given; you’re supposed to make them.

I hate this town. It’s too filled with memories I’d rather forget. I go to school every day, hang out with my friends, and then go home. There’s no place I’d rather not go ever again. I wonder if anything will ever change? Will that day ever come?
Keep on living your life in such a way that love doesn't fade away. I shall work... so that love may shine brightly, even today.
Everyone makes mistakes. What's important is how to make up for it.

He realized that he had lost sight of something important. No matter what turn he took he should have kept singing. Even if his songs couldn’t save the world, he could still sing songs for her. Don’t ever lose sight of what’s important to you.
Do not lose to the obstacles that you will meet in the future. I have my own set of goals but do not pursue them because of my laziness.

If a prediction is right, then it's like you only have one future. Like that future has been decided. But if it's wrong, then you have an almost infinite number of possibilities. And that means that even the tiniest twist of fate can change your future. I want to believe that I have choices - that the path I walk has many different turns, and many different roads to follow!
If I'm around you, I don't think I'll ever be bored.

If you feel like crying you should not hold back your tears. You should let it all out while you still can - because when you get bigger sometimes you can't cry even if you have something to cry about.
Life can bring lots of hardships, but it's always important to keep in mind that there are people around you who care for you, and are willing to help you through whatever you're dealing with.
It’s natural that men have things they need to protect.
If you can move on, then you should.

You’re the spore of a flower. You’ll be going on a trip, taken away by the wind. To go to new places and meet new people. You shouldn’t always rely on your sister. Even if you’re apart, your bonds still remain. That’s what family is.

Meeting you was the best thing that ever happened to me. You made me so happy. I don’t want you to be lost or afraid or anything like that. From here on out, I know things might be hard sometimes. But no matter what may await, please don’t regret meeting me.
Sanae-san told me, places that I can cry are in a toilet, or in daddy's arms.
If the results come true, it's as if there's only one future. If it fails, we can think that other futures exist... I want to believe that in our future there are many possibilities waiting.
Those who seek out the truth must not be arrogant. You must not laugh at miracles just because they cannot be explained scientifically. You must not turn away from the beauty of this world.
You are who you are. You have to do what you can.

At a place where you feel most restful… Next to the person you find most dear. People's lives are repetitions of inflicting pain on each other. It's understandable to doubt others. But being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to feel other people's love. Aren’t you, perhaps, feeling lonely? Aren’t you, perhaps, living slavishly? Are you able to laugh with an honest heart?
What’s important is not losing sight of your path.
No matter how cold and distant people may become, on the inside something warm and precious always remains, something that never changes. To me, that’s what family is like.
If you get all worked up yourself, you’ll always get someone who’ll rebel. Being too eager brings negative results.
Being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to sense other people's love.
We didn’t give up on our dreams! We changed our dreams into your dream! That’s what parents do! That’s what a family does!
The city is changing. Our surroundings, and even ourselves. And then one day, just about everything will change…
You're trying to stay unscarred, aren't you? If you've come this far, you'll have to hurt someone. The more time you take to decide, the deeper and more it'll hurt. For all of you.
You should cry while you still can. When you get bigger, sometimes, you can't cry even if you have something you wanna cry about.
Love is like a firework from the past... it's more beautiful for it to go to pieces and scatter far off.
Isn’t it fine as long as you find it? Isn’t it fine as long as you find the next fun and happy moments again?
The world is beautiful. Even if you're full of tears and sadness, open your eyes. Do what you want to do. Be what you want to be. Find friends. Don't be in a hurry to grow up. Take your time.
Time and titles do not matter in the bonds between people.

Children, this is the only gift I can give you right now. A formless gift you call a memory. I don’t have any money and I can’t give you something tangible. But even so, even if it isn’t tangible, a memory is something that will continue to be with you. That is what I believe…

I, Okazaki Nagisa, will no longer cry. No matter what painful things I face, I’ll hang in there and overcome it. But, I might cry during moments of happiness. I hope that you can get along… with someone like me.
Nothing can stay unchanged. Fun things… Happy things… They can’t possibly remain the same.

I've already decided. Getting good grades and listening to teachers can take me somewhere high and far away, but what if that's not where I want to go? Right here, by your side, Tomoya, is the only place I want to be.
The day before yesterday, I saw a rabbit. Yesterday, it was a deer. And today, it’s you.
You shouldn’t stop like that. If you can move forward, then you should.
You are who you are. You have to do what you can.
Dango, dango, dango, dango. Big dango family.
Our journey starts, on this long, long steep slope.
Fun things...Happy things...They can't all possibly stay unchanged. Even so, can you go on loving this place?
Isn’t there something strange in becoming friends because you’re asked? Friends aren’t given
Evil expects evil from others.

Man fears death and yet, at the same time, man is drawn to death. Death is endlessly consumed by men in cities and in literature. It is a singular event in one's life that none may reverse. That is what I desire.
I'm not interested in fighting. What I'm interested in is living.
Stop pitying yourself. Pity yourself, and life becomes an endless nightmare.

Anything I would never want to lose is always lost. It is a given that everything that is worth wanting will be lost the moment I obtain it. There's nothing worth pursuing at the cost of prolonging a life of suffering.
Success is harder than failure for many things in this world.
The words of your past are fundamentally unrelated to who you are now.
Resenting the past won't change anything. It just makes me want to kill myself! I have some control over my future, but there's no changing the past! I'll simply do what I can right now.
Romance is all about how far you'll go to prove your love. Finding a person who's worth the effort is pure luck. You just gotta wait for the right hurricane to sweep you off your feet.
I read in some book that sad and painful things are the spices of an enjoyable life... But I seem to get nothing but spices!
If you want to grow just look above you, there are plenty of people perfect to serve as fodder for your growth.
anime: Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma OVA

quote: Everyone wants to think like this: "It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.
anime: Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma OVA

quote: If there's something you want to go through with, you should stick to it without keeping up appearances.
anime: Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma OVA

quote: Everyone wants to think like this: ""It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent"". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.
anime: Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma OVA

quote: The ones who accomplish something are the fools who keep pressing onward. The ones who accomplish nothing are the wise who cease advancing.
anime: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

quote: Humans are creatures that always get hurt and feel regret whenever they make a choice on something.
anime: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

quote: Just walk the path you believe in. And don't forget, you're the main character of your own life story!
anime: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

quote: It's easy to say "choose so that you'll have no regrets," but that's impossible. No matter how hard you've agonized over your path, you'll always regret something about it later. That's just how we humans are made. Which is why I think our true feelings are important. If you choose your path based on your true feelings, it'll hurt just a little less when you feel the same regret, right?
anime: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

quote: It's easy to say ""choose so that you'll have no regrets,"" but that's impossible. No matter how hard you've agonized over your path, you'll always regret something about it later. That's just how we humans are made. Which is why I think our true feelings are important. If you choose your path based on your true feelings, it'll hurt just a little less when you feel the same regret, right?
anime: Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor

quote: The vast ocean of words. Without a means to cross the ocean, we can only stand and watch keeping the words we desperately want to express inside. A dictionary is a ship that is able to cross that ocean.
Fools set the rules in this world. Just take a look around. It's undeniable.
A lone warrior surviving hundreds of battles, when it comes to losing, I'm the strongest.
anime: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru

quote: It doesn't make a difference whether you have a talent or not. I mean, that isn't the end goal. You have greater freedom than we do. All I have are games. But you can go anywhere and become anything.
anime: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen

quote: Hope is harmony. A just heart, moving toward the light. That is all. Despair is hope's polar opposite. It is messy and confusing. Despair swallows up love, hatred, and everything else. Because not knowing where you will end up is despair. Despair is what even you cannot predict. Only despair's unpredictability will save you from a boring future.
anime: Danganronpa 3: The End of Kibougamine Gakuen - Zetsubou-hen

quote: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter. Many seasons have come and gone, but the one with you isn't coming around.

So I shall live, live, live and live some more, though there's no telling what life might have in store. And if I ever see you again, I want to let you know that the phrase 'aishteru'...I understand it a little now.
I cannot become a replacement for your lost child.
I did not know the word, which is why I’ve never said it before, but your eyes were beautiful from the moment we met.
Words can have different interpretations. What one says isn't the whole truth. It's a human weakness. They test others to confirm their own existence. It's a contradiction.
Live, and be free.

You’re going to learn a lot of things, But it might be easier to keep living, if you didn’t learn them, if you didn’t know them. You don’t realize your body is on fire and burning up because of the things you did. You’ll understand one day. And then you’ll realize for the first time that you have many burns.
Smile. Not for anyone else, but for yourself. Show yourself your own smile. You'll feel better then.
Well, this blows.
First it was that sewer-face and now I'm up against a superhero.
[clapping] A beautiful speech, I can see it now, you truly are a prince with the royal blood of a Saiyan.
I'm so hungry, I can't even move.
(Master Roshi is reaching for Launch's buttocks as Krillin barges in and makes him angry) Do you time this?

I'm not going to lie to you, Vegeta, although the answer may be difficult for you to hear. This is the truth. Goku devoted his life to protecting the lives of other. Because of his selflessness, when he died, he was allowed to keep his body and travel to King Kai's Planet. You, on the other hand, have spent your life in pursuit of your own selfish desires. You've caused too much pain. When you die, you will not receive the same reward.

You never thought to kill, or fight for revenge. Only to test your limits, and to push yourself beyond them, to become the strongest you could possibly be. How can a Saiyan fight like that, and at the same time be so gentle that he wouldn't hurt a fly? It makes me angry just thinking about it. But perhaps it is my anger that has made me blind to the truth for so long. I see it now. This day has made it all too clear. You're better than me, Kakarot. You are the best...
While I was with you guys, I became more human. I didn't like that. I even have a family and started to like living on earth.
That's what you think, Captain Cocky!
Yamcha, I was worried about you. For all I knew, you were dead in a ditch in a country you can't pronounce. You'll have to make this up to me. And you're going to enjoy it.
The ocean is so salty because everyone pees in it.
Where is your tail? (Searching for tail in Bulma's butt)
My ears do more than just frame my face.
Tell me, are all you Saiyans so full of yourselves? Is this how you hide your incompetence? We androids will always be superior to your kind.

But, you will not go in there with hopes of winning the tournament the first time you compete. To do so would be arrogant! And arrogance is for fools, not warriors! So you will enter the tournament with the sole purpose of improving your fighting skills.
Hey hun! I've got a great idea, let's trade! Yo take my spot and I'll fight Hercule!
You can take control of my mind and my body, but there is one thing a Saiyan always keep... his PRIDE!
(after Goku moves a huge boulder all by himself) Krillin wants everybody to know he's speechless right now.
Are you ready now, to witness a power not seen for thousands of years?
Don't remind me. I'm mad enough to hurt somebody and pounding you just might be the therapy I need.
Hey! It looks like now is a good time to do a little tail fishing!
It's amazing how every time you open your mouth, you manage to prove you're an idiot.
There are three things I cannot tolerate: cowardice, bad haircuts, and military insurrection. It is very unfortunate that our friend Vegeta possesses all three of these.
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.
There's only one certainty in life. A strong man stands above and conquers all!
Gohan, let it go. It is not a sin to fight for the right cause. There are those who words alone will not reach.
Kakarot! Dodge this next attack, if you can!.. But even if I miss you... THIS WHOLE PLANET'S GOING UP IN SMOOOOKE!
Father, you're so tough and proud, hard and cold like a rock. But still, deep down, your heart beats like mine does... I know you feel... I'm your son and I will always love you.
It looks like they only want me, and that's exactly who they'll get.
Sorry, I saw an opening that just screamed 'ATTACK,' so I did, ha!
Sometimes, we have to look beyond what we want and do what's best.
It looked like it was going to be germ warfare, but the Bacterian fight got me ready for that.
So he killed my father and murdered my people. That means nothing to me. Strength is the only thing that matters in this world. Everything else is just a delusion for the weak.
Trunks, I never hugged you as a baby... let me hug you.
(after Master Roshi tells him they have to dig in a farm) First we're the milkmen, and now we're stinkin' farmers. We never did this in Orin Temple.
What's wrong Frieza? Is your brain another one of your weak and under used muscles?
Not bad, for an early prototype.
Let me ask you. Does a machine like yourself ever experience fear?
You're about to find out what it's like to fight a real super saiyan...and I'm not talking about Goku.
I would rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster. (To Frieza)
I could go one step farther if I wanted to.
[Vegeta's last thought before he dies fighting Majin Buu] Bulma, Trunks. This is for you.
Even with the energy you took from me, my power is still far greater than your own.
How can androids have babies?
Death is simply another stage of our life.
My butt's on fire!
Why do women have butts on their chests?
Look Goku, you can go out in public and have your hair sticking out in every direction if you want to, but not me!
Gohan, let it go. It is not a sin to fight for the right cause. There are those who words alone will not reach.
Gohan, you showed me that power is nothing without being guided without love.

character: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
quote: Time waits for no one.
anime: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

quote: Incomprehensibility is a part of human life. But what does this mean? I just can't understand it.
Even though we are going to shatter thousands of lives, wearing white is gonna make the blood look so pretty.

Depending on who you place in the same situation, the characteristics of said incident change kaleidoscopically. In other words, there is one incident; however, there are as many stories explaining it as there are people involved in it.
We have no reason to fear death, for we have become ghosts while still alive.

Cast aside the illusion that there is a beginning and end to the story. The story has no beginning. And it has no end. All there is, is a performance of people connecting, living, influencing each other, and departing.

Tedium is such a crime. It takes the limited amount of time that is given to man, and rather than spending it in indolence or drowning it in pleasure it just sits there sucking, eating it up. I can't put up with that, tedium is a crime! Death to tedium! Die!

You don't have any power or technique like Jack Johnson or Jack Dempsey either! You know any boxer names? You know I'm right? If you're an American, of course you know! If you say you don't know, or something, I won't forgive you! I will never forgive you! And even if you know them, I still won't forgive you, though!

I just know you are all my newest enemies... and you have really nice guns. You people are all the same. You think you're so special! "Oh yeah, with all of our wonderful guns on this pathetic train, there's no way anyone can stop us! We are invincible and unbeatable! We are so strong with all of our men and our guns!" *laughs*

The times when you want to cry are when you have to try your hardest. That's why I decided I'll cry in general. Then, when I have to shed tears for a time when I really want to cry, my tears would have run dry.

Imagine what'd happen if I let someone like you loose on a bunch of politicians and scientists. You'd have them brainwashed in three days flat. First, you'd whisper your promises into their ears, getting them interested, and before they knew it, they'd be eating out of your goddamn hand. One of those scientists would say, "Hey, this Huey fella, I think he's a really swell guy. We should talk to him and see what sort of information he might share with us". And you can bet your ass by that point his brain would already be dribbling out his ears. Then oh, look, a strap on your straight jacket came loose, and oh, the next day they walk in and find out everyone in the lab is dead, and oh, Huey fucking Laforet is nowhere to be fucking seen! Oh no, oh what ever shall we fucking do Mr. Talbot, please do something even though you told us this exact thing was going to happen and we ignored you like the fucking idiots we are... and then they'll try and get me to find you, but you know what? I'll say no! Lemme say that again! No! Once more for good measure! Read my lips! Enn! Oh! No!

Now, dear Uncle, there's a certain person that I'd just love to kill. It doesn't even matter whether they're weak or strong. The people I live to kill, that really get me jazzed... never see it coming. Never. They're in some happy place where they're sure nothing can get them. Dying is the furthest thing from their minds. Maybe they're thinkin' about what they're gonna have for dinner. Just like you were. Right before I walked in.

[to Chane] Sorry about this, young lady, but not being able to verbalize might be a lucky break for you in a way. People can waste an awful lot of energy by putting sadness into words. Or maybe joy into words. And then of course, there's putting anger into words. And the words can double when it comes to fear or pain. In that sense, being so afraid that you can't find any words may save your life. Being unable to speak in extreme stress, in a body that is obligated to control energy consumption, is an act of, OH, I don't know, maybe, self defense? Oh boy, I went and said a thing of actual intelligence there. Time to show me some love, boys!
I'm going to kill you, have a beautiful laugh, then dance until I go mad.

Let me tell you an incomprehensible story! What is it for the actions of men to be incomprehensible? It would seem to me that if it can't be comprehended, one should not even bother trying. It is useless to even think about it, I think. That said, I don't know exactly what's going on but may we continue fighting please?

Let me tell you how important it is to keep your mouth shut. Me, I've seen so many damn people going on and on about "these will be the last words you ever hear" and "take these words with you to the afterlife", and then that gives whoever they're fighting an opening to strike back. Crazy, isn't it? I see it all the time, in books, in plays, even in real life! I don't even know why, but somehow the more comfortable someone is with killing, the more they flap their mouth when it comes time to do the deed, yakking on and on and on. As you might have guessed, I myself happen to be such a person! And therefore, as such, in light of that revelation, I'll say that one is enough, and since that one is of course myself, I want you all to shut up. You're boring. Swallow those words and take them to the afterlife yourself, if you want them delivered there so damn much.
It doesn't matter who I am. You can just think of me as the talking air.
There's no such thing as a limit on being the best. You can always go for more. That's what it means to be human. No... That's what it means to be me.
Depending on your request, whether I will laugh or get angry - that will decide your lifespan, boy.

This world is mine. I think this world may even just be a long, long dream I'm watching. You guys may just be illusions, and it can't be proven whether or not you really exist either. In other words, this world was created with me at the center. So what will happen if I die? I don't know. My imagination isn't very creative; I just can't imagine myself dying. In other words, there is no way this world can completely disappear. But if I die, then everyone will disappear. I am the only one in this world who won't disappear. The rest are just people I see as if in a dream.

So what if I'd spare him? In my mind it's the certainty in myself that I possess which allows me to have that kind of mercy or compassion. There's no wavering on that point. It's fixed like the stars. The fact is I'm never gonna be killed! So remember this: mercy and compassion are virtues that only the strong are privileged to possess. And I am strong.
I won't die no matter what. That's what I believe, so stay silent and believe in me. I am a guy who will never die.

Oh, life is fun! Try sayin' that ten times fast ten thousand times a minute every day for the rest of your life and it'll screw with your head so bad that all problems will disappear like MAGIC! Okay okay okay, I've gotten past the sadness and as of now I'm evolving to a HIGHER STAAAATE! Right? Tell me you all think so! Life is a magnificent beast, and it excites me!
No, it's good, money is good. I'm not sure why, but everyone says money is good.

Imagine what'd happen if I let someone like you loose on a bunch of politicians and scientists. You'd have them brainwashed in three days flat. First, you'd whisper your promises into their ears, getting them interested, and before they knew it, they'd be eating out of your goddamn hand. One of those scientists would say, ""Hey, this Huey fella, I think he's a really swell guy. We should talk to him and see what sort of information he might share with us"". And you can bet your ass by that point his brain would already be dribbling out his ears. Then oh, look, a strap on your straight jacket came loose, and oh, the next day they walk in and find out everyone in the lab is dead, and oh, Huey fucking Laforet is nowhere to be fucking seen! Oh no, oh what ever shall we fucking do Mr. Talbot, please do something even though you told us this exact thing was going to happen and we ignored you like the fucking idiots we are... and then they'll try and get me to find you, but you know what? I'll say no! Lemme say that again! No! Once more for good measure! Read my lips! Enn! Oh! No!

Let me tell you how important it is to keep your mouth shut. Me, I've seen so many damn people going on and on about ""these will be the last words you ever hear"" and ""take these words with you to the afterlife"", and then that gives whoever they're fighting an opening to strike back. Crazy, isn't it? I see it all the time, in books, in plays, even in real life! I don't even know why, but somehow the more comfortable someone is with killing, the more they flap their mouth when it comes time to do the deed, yakking on and on and on. As you might have guessed, I myself happen to be such a person! And therefore, as such, in light of that revelation, I'll say that one is enough, and since that one is of course myself, I want you all to shut up. You're boring. Swallow those words and take them to the afterlife yourself, if you want them delivered there so damn much.
Depending on who you place in the same situation, the characteristics of said incident change kaleidoscopically. In other words, there is one incident

I just know you are all my newest enemies... and you have really nice guns. You people are all the same. You think you're so special! ""Oh yeah, with all of our wonderful guns on this pathetic train, there's no way anyone can stop us! We are invincible and unbeatable! We are so strong with all of our men and our guns!"" *laughs*

This world is mine. I think this world may even just be a long, long dream I'm watching. You guys may just be illusions, and it can't be proven whether or not you really exist either. In other words, this world was created with me at the center. So what will happen if I die? I don't know. My imagination isn't very creative
Aren't we all monsters inside?
You suddenly appeared in front of me in this hell. The day that I would get to meet you...I always wanted to apologize to you...I only endured because of that! I kept on living.
I hate these horns.
Everyone in this place is unhappy. And since they're unhappy, they're probably looking for someone worse off than they are.
All this time, I've lived in hope of telling you how sorry I am, I've fought armies, just to have this chance, but now, there's nothing I can say.. That's good enough.
I pull the trigger. The gun goes off. Your brains splatter all over the sand. The beach gets bloody and you get dead.
I envy you just for having someone who's worried about you.
I was going to let you go. After all, there aren't many of us out there, but you're just such a pain in the ass.
Regret is the domain of those who have earned the right to look back at the past. All I have is shame.
People who think that they can make up their past follies with regret, cannot be forgiven.
When you are miserable, you need something that is even more miserable than you to feel good about yourself.
Yeah I lied; so what is the truth? Underneath the band-aid?
When you're on a bike, the ocean's a lot closer than you think. The autumn salt wind went right through to the back of my nose. And maybe it's because, like Haruko said, my head was empty.

...Watermelon. Or like a panda with a mean face, or like sandals with pressure points drawn on them, or the smell of a blackboard eraser, or a Sunday morning where you wake up and it's raining. Well, I like him more than hard bread.

Nothing amazing happens here. Everything is ordinary. The huge factory that can be seen from our town, the Medical Mechanica Plant, all the adults got excited when it came here, like it was really a big thing. The white steam that blows out every day at the same time, it looked to me like smoke that signified some kind of omen. Smoke that spreads out and covers everything.

You're Puss in Boots, the one who tricks the prince. He hides who he really is and pretends to be someone else forever. So in time he becomes that person, so his lie becomes the truth, see? He transcends the mask. Don't you get it? That's how he finds happiness. That's pretty good, right?
I can hardly tell anymore where the truth ends and the lies begin.
Please don't tell people our bakery's motorbike ran you over.
[a giant satellite bomb is headed towards the city] If that thing hits, do you think we'll have school tomorrow?
Nothing amazing happens here. Only the ordinary.
Hey! Sameji, why don't we give Takkun a little preview of forbidden lesbian love?

When you're in a town like this, all covered with smoke - you forget that there's a world outside. Nothing amazing happens here. And you get used to that. Used to a world where everything is ordinary. Every day we spend here is like a whole lifetime of dying slowly. But now Haruko is here. That's how I know there really is a world outside.
It takes an idiot to do cool things. That's why it's cool.
Yeah I lied
This is vengeance, so I am to ferry you to hell.
You are coming with me, we are going to hell.
When one person is cursed, two graves are dug.
Human is an existence full of sin.
We will take revenge on your behalf.
I shall cleanse away thy bitterness...
Hell is in human heart.
Once the revenge is dealt, you are required to pay the compensation.
Your grievance shall be avenged.
Pitiful shadow cloaked in darkness. Thy action cause men pain and suffering. Thy hollow soul drowns in thy sins. How would you like to see what death is like?
To hate or to be hated, someone will hate again. To send or to be sent to Hell, someone will be sent there again. I have witnessed this cycle over and over again. No one can stop it.
Ippen shindemiru?
Do you want to experience what dying is like?
The real hell is inside the person.
Seasons change just like the passing of time. We all have out destines and then we must move. That's they way it has always been.

Though we had to part, though we could never be together again. We had no regrets. Even if she returned to her world, married another man and had children with him. If the woman I loved was happy, then I could be happy. And I am. Our hearts had joined and so, even if she lived in a different world, that time, we really were together always, always. I would never let go of this feeling, or my love for her.
Whatever your thoughts may be, if you don't say them, none of it will be acknowledged by others.

The world you can see isn't all out there. In the world there are a lot of fascinating things that no living soul has ever seen! And just in knowing that is one cause for happiness. I'm sure you can find happiness meant for you! It might be something you might not quite understand yet. But you'll find it, that much is certain!
*Laughing* Touya, you can't help but think that Sakura is really, really cute.
I see you have a determined spirit, Sakura... however... I am not as sentimental as Keroberos.
I'm really lucky to have a dinosaur for a little sister!
If he can fly, I can fly! I can do anything he can!
You really loved Mr. Clow, didn't you? It hurts, doesn't it? It hurts to lose someone you love.
Water... is a thing that flows.
*to Syaoran* No matter what you are thinking, if you don't say it, you won't be able to express it.
*to Kero* Our relationship chart has gotten rather complicated.
I didn't know everything. There were a couple things that happened that weren't expected by myself or Clow Reed.
In this life, I'm known as Eriol Hiiragizawa. In my past life, I was known as...Clow Reed.
*to Sakura* A smile suits best on your face.
*to Sakura* I... I love you.
I'm going to get all the Clow cards.
Even if I lose this feeling, I'm sure that I'll just fall in love with you all over again.
I am not a monster!
*to Yue*  I don't want to be your master. I want to be your friend.
The person he loves, I love that person too, and I'm sure that person loves him too. So it's okay that he doesn't love me.
Whatever your thoughts may be, if you don't say them, none of them will be acknowledged by others.
Yuki, have some antidote before you leave. *to Yukito, as he eats Sakura's cooking*
*to Kero* Stop eating snacks so mindlessly and think of what we can do!
*to Li* In the elevator, when you called me "Sakura", it made me very happy.
I know! You must be hungry! No wait, that's me.
Get my cool pose as well!
I know our magic is hidden in these forms and he can't sense a thing. But a FAIRY?! How would YOU like to be called a fairy?!
Men are complicated!
The greatest happiness for me is to let the person I most like have the most happiness.
You always look at me with such a scary face.
I have never dreamed that I would be chased by a piano...
Yue-san is handsome, but Yukito-san is... schweeeet!
If that brat had become the Master, I'd have lost all my confidence to live!
Living in a world without the feeling for the person you love most is too harsh!
Niichan, you really do work part-time everywhere...
I'm always where food is!
Sakura's head is as hard as a rock.
Do Japanese panthers have wings?!
Girls are scary when they're angry!

The world you can see isn't all out there. In the world there are a lot of fascinating things that no living soul has ever seen! And just in knowing that is one cause for happiness. I'm sure you can find happiness meant for you! It might be something you might not quite understand yet. But you'll find it, that much is certain!
*to Li* In the elevator, when you called me ""Sakura"", it made me very happy.
From a different perspective, an imposing wall is just a large door.
The sea’s blue reflects because of the sky’s blue. Just like detectives and thieves. We’re all toying with the human mind. But the one who pries for others’ secrets is the one who’s truly impolite.
The strong one doesn't win. The one who wins is strong.
A detective who corners a culprit with their reasoning and drives them to suicide in front of himself - is no different than a murderer.
There’s no use. There’s no such thing as a victory that can be won through effort. It doesn’t exist.

It’s like an automated vending machine for canned juice. You’ll get what you want so long as you have the money, but… You get nothing in return without it. You can’t buy your way into the hearts of others.
Give advice and good guidance, then halt if such is of no avail. Do not disgrace yourself for it.
Humans can’t reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You’ll be punished.
Those who do well, respect their chances. Those who pass on chances, may never be presented with that chance again.
When people make a mistake, it is nice to give them advice, but... if they don’t listen, just leave them alone. Otherwise you'll do yourself a disservice by wasting your time and effort.

Love is an emotional thing. I will say nothing in praise of it... It is antagonistic to clear reasoning. It's the same in tennis. Love is 0. No matter how many zeroes you add together, you'll just lose miserably.
A small mistake can make a huge difference.
There is only one truth.
Be as swift as the wind. Be as quiet as the forest. Attack as fiercely as the fire. Be immovable like a mountain. Move like the lightning. Be as impenetrable as a shadow.
The moon does not mourn over the dead. What it does is shine light on the truth.

Admiration is admiration. It's the same as viewing flowers from afar. When you get too close - it becomes like Icarus, who lost his wings and plunged into the earth after flying too close to the Sun. Disaster befalls oneself.
Idiot... There's no win or lose in this, no higher or lower... There is always...only ONE truth.
To deceive your enemy, begin with your ally.

You can't perform the same trick twice with one audience. If performed only once, the magic leaves a strong impression. It will then blossom into a beautiful miracle in their hearts. But, when used twice, rather than the audience enjoying the magic, they focus on unraveling the trick. As such, the chance of it being unveiled is high.
You are right. I am not a detective, but a thief. And stealing is what thieves do best, even if it's a persons heart.
Relying on someone else without exerting any effort of your own is just not right. Because the one you rely on most, can disappear, at any time.
Smiles and laughter are always good, but never forget your Poker Face!
This is my case! I'm going to solve it!! Don't get involved!
Humans are suspicious and jealous creatures. When they see something perfect, they wanna find a flaw.
Courage is a word that gives you the strength to do what's right, you should not use it as an excuse to murder someone.

She should want to see me. If I had said how I feel about her, she would miss me even more. All this time, I've been breaking her heart by keeping her wait, yet I can't still appear before her eyes. I never want to see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer exist in her heart. How immature of me, right?
They say time and a people’s heart are inversely proportional. The more it passes, the more they grow apart. It seems there are some rare exceptions though.

Flowers are fragile and ephemeral... Even if you meant to protect them with a surrounding fence from wind and rain, they would die without sunlight...and a spindly fence has no power against a strong wind. Are you fully aware of that, Kudo-kun?..

People have emotions. A troublesome attribute that's not only invisible, but also changes easily. If it's friendship or love, then that's fine. But if by some trigger it changes to malice and vengeance, then that could bring forth thoughts of murder.
You’d better not (rip my mask). Like Pandora’s box, you want to open it because you don’t know what’s inside. But if you know what’s inside before you open it… It’s boring, isn’t it?
If you’re too lucky, people will get jealous of you.
If you force me to pick one… It’d be black. It covers up the things inside of me that I don’t want to be known about. Well, for the same reason… Black is the color I hate too.
Memories of someone who’s passed away remains beautiful forever and a person’s heart will linger over them, they say.
The only ones that can miss a kick draw match are those who have enough courage to kick it.
Is a reason nesessary? I don't know why you would kill someone. But as for saving someone... A logical mind isn't needed, right?
I wonder if there really is a God... If such an entity really existed, wouldn't all honest, hard-working people be happy?

If I told her how I feel, she'd miss me even more. Afterall, I'm the guy who keeps breaking her heart by making her wait an eternity... even though I'm always by her side. I don't wanna see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer have a place in her heart. Seems pretty childish of me, doesn't it?

You're always away during the important times and all you do is call. There are times when you are finally here, but then you disappear unexpectedly. Every time... every time... always, always, leaving me behind alone. What do you think I am? I love you Shinichi!
With a keen eye for detail one truth always prevails.
People can really change. When they're far away from each other, their hearts will change. It's so cruel that the only thing I can do is wait.
Life is short so it will be appreciated. We live to our fullest due to that.

If you plan to continue being a detective and using words to entrap people, inscribe this in your hearts: Words are like knives. When used incorrectly, they turn into foul weapons. You have to understand the opponent’s heart and use them with discretion. No matter who it is you’re dealing with.
I understand your feelings of wanting to bring the bad guy to justice, but do bear with it. It also requires courage to hide oneself.
By looking at what's blocking our way, with an open mind, a wall can be turned into a wide-open door.
Sometimes feelings get tangled together with deductions, forming a veil that hides the truth.
It’s unbearable to die hating someone.
Justice isn’t something that you can just proclaim. It’s a feeling you should keep near your heart.
In this world, who knows who might kill who.

Sorry, a trick is nothing but a puzzle mankind came up with. If you use your head, you can uncover the logical answer. It’s disappointing. No matter the explanation I think of, I cannot understand why one person would kill another. Even if I can see why, I can’t understand why.
Don't judge people from the outside. Like any rose has thorns, the more the person appears nice on the outside, the more you should doubt the inside.
People’s feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
Courage is a word of justice. It means the quality of mind that enables one to face apprehension with confidence and resolution. It is not right to use it as an excuse to kill someone.

What value does your will have? I asked you what price it carries. If money is enough, is your will for sale? A will that can be bought with money... what's the meaning of that? If your will can be bought with money... then it will vanish along with that money. Am I wrong?
If you let anger and revenge consume you... You'll find yourself unable to behold the beautiful sights right before your eyes.
The right thing is… to have faith in life, until you’re sure of death. That’s what makes a great detective.
People's feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
Even if you are facing a bitter aspect of life... Drugs and murder are foul, without any excuse. Deserve a red card, for a loser.
A thief is a creative artist who takes his prey in style... But a detective is nothing more than a critic, who follows our footsteps.
If it’s an important memory, then you shouldn't forget it. Since those who aren't with us only live on in our memories.
Words are like swords. If you use them the wrong way, they can turn into ugly weapons.
That’s right. Worried about being discovered, living in fear. It’s a painful thing.
If... If you have such good deductive skills, you should have been able to see through my sister's disguise easily... But... but... WHY...!!!
Instead of humans who lie and cheat each other to get richer, I prefer animals who hunt to survive.

It's just like changes in the notes and passports. You may find it hard to adjust to at the beginning, but you get used to it eventually. Time is very depressing after all... Both happiness and sadness fade away with time.
It's better trusting someone than to die doubting people altogether.
Oh right, most talented artists become famous after they're dead, I'll make you great by taking you to the cemetery called prison!
Humans live behind masks.
Our contribution will never come into light, but the failure will be noticed immediately.

If you stay hidden like this, you'll be able to get away from the police, however, you will never escape your crime... Madam, are you trying... Are you trying to force your son to carry this burden for the rest of his life?
There's no such thing as a perfect person in this world.
Life is short so it will be appreciated. We live to our fullest due to that.
Be as swift as the wind. Be as quiet as the forest. Attack as fiercely as the fire. Be immovable like a mountain. Move like the lightning. Be as impenetrable as a shadow.
If you let anger and revenge consume you... You'll find yourself unable to behold the beautiful sights right before your eyes.
People’s feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
Humans can’t reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You’ll be punished.
Humans live behind masks.
When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
You are right. I am not a detective, but a thief. And stealing is what thieves do best, even if it's a persons heart.
Don't judge people from the outside. Like any rose has thorns, the more the person appears nice on the outside, the more you should doubt the inside.
Don't beg for it, earn it. Do it, and you'll be rewarded.
If you don't believe in anything, it no longer has the power to hurt.
It's not like something is going to happen because I believe in it.  Sometimes you end up worse off because you believed in something too much. There are times it's tough to believe in something.
Did you know? The world is full of hate and there isn't any reason for it?
Hundreds of gallons of blood from all the people I've killed in the past, have seeped into this body.
Don't beg for things, get them yourself or else you won't get anything.

I'm still very very young. I want to go shopping, and I want to eats lots more of all kinds of yummy foods, you know? And of course... Of course... have a wonderful romance too. If I could have something like that, it would be the best. Yeah... That really would be the best.
Freedom is something that you need to actively acquire. It's not something that's given with no strings attached. To be free means to take responsibility, and to prepare yourself for what's to come.
Don't worry about being so considerate of adults. You can only be a kid for so long, so you might as well enjoy it.
Whoever said one's first love is bittersweet, is a liar. It is only bitter.
Never beg and earn by winning or else you won't get anything.
Freedom is something you have to fight for, rather than something you're given. Being free means being prepared to carry that burden.
Is this God's punishemt for falling in love with an angel? As the gossamer floats ever eluding my grasp, it weighs heavily upon my heart.
So many faces looking like they're thinking even though they're not. So disgusting.
Don't beg for things, get them yourself or else you won't get anything.
If people could become friends simply by sharing bread and salt, life would be simpler.

anime: Gankutsuou: The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Everyone has a sword within their hearts; the purer the heart, the sharper the sword.
anime: Gankutsuou: The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: Everyone has a sword within their hearts

quote: The moment of one's confession, is the moment of another's dumping.
I CAN DO THAT TOO!" *He takes out a banana and squishes it, giggling evilly*
Rather than regret doing nothing, regret something that you've done.
I don't think I'm cut out for manual labor. I need to get a more creative job, like saving the whales.
Even though one is dumped, no matter how one shows his misfortune and seeks kindness, the world doesn't give a damn about it.
Now, now, these things happen to everyone... EXCEPT ME!!!!! That's for making fun of my masterpiece! If there's one thing I hate, it's criticism!
Rather than not doing anything and regretting it, we should do something and regret it.
I CAN DO THAT TOO!" *He takes out a banana and squishes it, giggling evilly*
I CAN DO THAT TOO!"" *He takes out a banana and squishes it, giggling evilly*
The opposite of love isn't hate, it’s apathy.
If I described him in one word, it'd be di*k[beep]!
Those who have no skill, require harsh instruction if they are to have any hope to get any better.
It's my job to make school fun.
[Onizuka's p*nis is bit by a snake]Someone. Suck the poison out! ...Fuyutsuki-chan! I beg you! Suck it out quickly!

You know, when I was in high school, I was a troublemaker. I hardly went to school. Before I knew it, I was expelled. When I couldn't go anymore, was when I first realized, that school was a great thing. There's a lot of friends and lots of fun things. When I got this old, I wanted even more to go to school. That's why I became a teacher. Because, if I become a teacher, I could stay in school until I die, right? That's why I'm really happy now. I want you to be like that too. I want you to like school. Once it's over, it's too late.
Give a kid a smoke and he'll be happy for a day. Teach him how to smoke... he'll be happy for his whole shortened life.
Sometimes violence is the only way to get the message across.
A brat who is afraid to be hurt isn't qualified to love someone.

You think you can just escape? Walk out of this world like it's some bad movie? It's too easy to make like a bird. To flap your wings as you chicken out after causing all these problems. The tough part's walking. Taking what comes along and walking right through it. That's what real people do.
We cannot go back to the past, no matter how hard we try. No matter how wonderful it was. The past is nothing but the past.

It doesn't matter what you achieve in life. It's how you live that really matters. Countless men have lost their lives in war without fulfilling their life's ambitions. Shiba stood by his convictions, no matter how lonely he got. So I think that in the end, he must've been happier than anyone.
Is fighting right, or wrong? Does winning in the end mean justice? Truthfully, I don't know. But I know we must fight this battle! Or we will never save the world.
If something has a strong core, it won't break. That's true for both - swords and people.
Life isn't about counting all the things you've lost, It's about increasing the number of important things in it.
But maybe life isn't about counting all the things you've lost.
Heh, I guess somehow without me knowing, it just feels so natural now, to have Kagome by my side.
It's nice not to be alone.

Neither one nor the other, not a demon, but not a human either, no place no belong… I thought the only way was to carve out your own place, by force; that’s how I survived. And by the time I knew what was happening, I was all alone…
[to Sesshoumaru after he steals the Tetsuaiga] Blah, blah, blah. A guy gets his hands on a new sword, and already he's lookin' for a soap box to stand on and preach it to the world!
I'm gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a bowl. By the time I'm through with you, you're going to wish it was you who was dead.
Why am I always the one handing out apologies?
I'd rather give up my eye, than give up his sword. Maybe I'm not so worthless after all.
The little man is having trouble holding his sword. *to Inuyasha*
[repeatedly] Inuyasha, sit, boy.
As long as she's alive and well, that's all I hope for. I can't bear to see another woman die.
Hey, Shippo. Your village called.They're asking for their idiot!
Just apologize, even if you don't mean it. *to some kid, about Inuyasha*
That's why Kagome sent me, so I can protect you from being protected by him.
*to Inuyasha* I quite miss you as well, little brother.
To live is to die, to die is to live. Pure is unpure, unpure is pure.
I despise you with my last breath. My spirit will not forget that all consuming hatred.  So long that you live, my spirit can not be free. *to Inuyasha*
Six innocent peasants down, hundreds of thousand more to go.
Inuyasha, after meeting you I renounced my postion as a shrine priestess. I became an ordinary woman. I longed to embrace you like this when I was alive...
You got two legs and a heart beat. What's stopping you?

Half breed or full breed, to me it don't matter. But when you insult my mother, that's when I get angry. For her sake then if for nothing else... I'm gonna make you pay! [he jumps up and attacks Sesshoumaru, hitting him for the first time]
That's pretty bad when you can even give a half demon the creeps. *to Kagome*
I would come up there and finish you off. If you didn't look half dead already.
Aahhh someone saves me.
I can't save you. I can't do anything to help you, except stay like this. If only I could stop time.
People like you... are the reason why people like me need medication.
You're not as slow as you look, monk.
I didn't say get naked, stupid. I just can't stand seeing you in those clothes.
[about 500 feet behind InuYasha] I can see why being called a mutt by Koga would upset him... but now that I see him sitting there sniffing the ground he does look like a dog.
Tragic he said. I'm tragic?
I loathe all things, I despise every living creature who's bound to time.
There was no place for me, so I had to make one for myself, and then I realized, I had a place, but I was the only one in it. I didn't know any other way to live.
You're a real sight for sore eyes. *to Kagome*
Think you're pretty smart, you old hag. (to Kaede)
You vile beast. I despise you. You loathsome half man.
Don't you faint on me, you stupid girl.
Kagome, what do you have in your bag? Rocks?
Are you stupid?
Be not a fool, I have no such time to waste.
[after witnessing a small argument between Inuyasha and Kagome] Inuyasha, your patience with this creature is astonishing to me. You protect her, indulge her, even seem to love her.
Well excuse me for making you sleep in the wild all the time.
You shouldn't talk to yourself. People will wonder.
Life itself is a frightening image for every human being... being strong in life isn't easy.
All that for a memory and a dead mortal girl. If I've known that this is all it took to make you fight, I would have killed her sooner. (to Inuyasha)
Say please, before asking for favor.
Maybe it's just the morning light, but he looks pretty cool standing there with his sword. *about Inuyasha*
This scheme of yours is beneath me.  Should it fail, Jaken, you will die.

I'm a half-demon, more egotistical and greedy than any other living creature — that's what human beings are, right?.. But with human blood flowing through my veins, I never give up! Don't you understand? When you have someone to protect, your power increases multifold!
*to Inuyasha* Your stupidity knows no boundaries. Run and hide while you can.
This may come as something of a surprise, but I'm a sore loser.
I was wrong, kill him.
Are you going to keep staring at me because it's ticking me off. If you got something to say, say it.
Can it be that I'm afraid or is it merely I know not my own limit?
You sent me into a battle armed with a mere hunch?
I will hunt down Kikyou's killer and avenge her death
I've heard similar threats from a number of poor fools whose memories I keep alive by dancing on their tombstones!
Once the thread of fate is tangled, it cannot be undone.
I wish for a heart. A heart of the man whom I'll never allow to forget me.
I must find a place to pawn this off.
Only a fool refuses a woman who offers herself.
My only ambition is simply to kill as many people as humanly possible.
I am not going to kill you - I am going to break you.
[with a bow and arrow ready to fire] Not as pretty as his, huh? What would you know about it? You live in a time where they don't even have SHAMPOO.
*while stomping on Inuyasha* Lay down, be silent, sleep, rest, sleep... how many times do I have to tell you...
Well, well, if it isn't the holy monk.
*to Inuyasha* You fight as though you're still a child.
Inuyasha, you and I were fated to never meet again.
Windscar!
What good is this cursed hand if I can't protect the woman I love?
But is it necessary to keep stroking my leg while you talk. *to Miroku*
I can't compete with Kikyo, because, after all, I'm still alive
He's thanking me? That can't be good. *about Inuyasha*
Stop coming after the jewel. I do not wish to waste more arrows.
I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don't know what exactly I'll be able to do for you, but I'll always be by your side.
*to Kikyo* I swear... I will never let Naraku harm you.
How could I forget? He's into dead girls.
The future is not a straight line. There are many different pathways. We must try to decide that future for ourselves.
Don't be stupid. You're just a human. So back off, shut up, and butt out. *to Kagome*
[to Kagome, angry at her for saying she believes in him] You are nuts! This sword is good for nothing! Me, I'll live, I'm half demon. You though, you ain't got a chance.
Someone the exact opposite of Inuyasha.  That's the perfect guy for me.
Neither one nor the other, not a demon, but not a human either, no place no belong… I thought the only way was to carve out your own place, by force
Real men know when to run like a little bitch.
Real men know when to run like a little bitch.
How is this possible? I must be the first person in history who was flushed down the toilet!
The past is the past. We cannot indulge ourselves in memories and destroy the present.
Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us.
I’m saying that love is not something that you’re only supposed to give to a single person and not another. Love is something you’re supposed to give equally to everyone.
The disturbance in the stitch, is a disturbance in the heart.

[To Yuuri Shibuya] Does your Majesty believe in Time? Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us. During the 15 years that I waited for your Majesty to grow up and for the day when you would come to this world, Time gave me happiness every day. And after you came to this world... This is my conclusion, made during all the time that I have been with you.
This has got to be a joke! I'm being sucked into a black hole inside a toilet! Either that or there's one gigantic vacuum cleaner down here.
"Falsity" is changing the truth. "Ignorance" is not realizing the truth. "Incompetence" is being unable to fully grasp the truth.
Falsity"" is changing the truth. ""Ignorance"" is not realizing the truth. ""Incompetence"" is being unable to fully grasp the truth.
We are far, far, very, very far apart... but it might be that thoughts can overcome time and distance.
There is a word "world". Until about the time I was in middle school, I vaguely thought the word meant the area where the signals from my cell would reach.
You can take a picture of something and it never does it justice... I think about that sometimes when I see a picture of you.
There is a word ""world"". Until about the time I was in middle school, I vaguely thought the word meant the area where the signals from my cell would reach.
Jomy is still young, he doesn't know that there will be problems that he can't overcome with just will.
You'll never know what's right or wrong until everything is over.
Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding.
The only thing you can change about the past is how you feel about it in the present.
Don’t push your feelings onto others. No matter what pretty words you use, your kindness is just hypocrisy. You’re pretending to be nice only to make yourself feel better.
The meaning to our existence... is to live. To remember those who have died and face the world. God doesn't exist. I will. Through my own will.
People can only truly understand things that they've actually experienced.

No one knows what’s going to happen to the world. But I believe we have the ability to deal with that. Although we cannot change the past - we can change the future. We can change it into the world we desire.
Reflecting upon death, one appreciates life. If that’s the case, does it take a mistake for people to choose the right path? Behold the brilliance of the heavens burdened with sin.
While we are talking of peace, people are dying.
Anyone can smile if you give them something to be happy about.
I came to believe that a world where people can understand each other isn't impossible. That's why even if the world rejects me... even if the world blames me... I'll keep on fighting.
Everyone has to decide for themselves which choice to make. If you fight, people may die... but if you don't fight, people may still die. There's no "right" or "wrong" choice to make.
You people, are you satisfied with this kind of world? I'm not.

Even since the industrial revolution, humanity has used its technological knowledge for conflict and repeatedly risked its own extinction. Though great leaders appeared at times, they’d reach the end of their lives in a few decades... and the world would return to a state of chaos.
Search out the facts, then string them all together... and that's when the truth will be revealed.

I wanted to know why was the world so twisted? Where did this twistedness come from? How can people be so wicked without needing to be? And why don't they realize their wickedness? Why are there things that bring chaos to so many lives? Why do people rule and let themselves be ruled? And why do they hurt each other? And why despite all that do people still want to live their lives? I was just looking for answers. I thought that if I met with you, you'd give me those answers... because you're looking for the same thing along a different path from mine - from the path where people can understand each other.
I’m sorry. But, you know? I'm only human. It's natural that I'll fail on occasion.

Whether you like it or not, time will leave you behind. In the same way that your beauty will wither away with time. In order to cling to the glorious past, people achieve peace by hurting others. People know it isn't the right thing to do, but they're unable to stop any of it. Wouldn't you agree that someone needs to teach them a lesson?
I came to believe that a world where people can understand each other isn't impossible. That's why even if the world rejects me... even if the world blames me... I'll keep on fighting.

I wanted to know why was the world so twisted? Where did this twistedness come from? How can people be so wicked without needing to be? And why don't they realize their wickedness? Why are there things that bring chaos to so many lives? Why do people rule and let themselves be ruled? And why do they hurt each other? And why despite all that do people still want to live their lives? I was just looking for answers. I thought that if I met with you, you'd give me those answers... because you're looking for the same thing along a different path from mine - from the path where people can understand each other.
Everyone has to decide for themselves which choice to make. If you fight, people may die... but if you don't fight, people may still die. There's no ""right"" or ""wrong"" choice to make.
Everyone becomes an adult by learning how to give up on things.

Humans are creatures that dream. Different from others, they want to be special. They want to be adored by others, just like the heroes in comics and games, achieving great things with unique powers. Of course, no one ever believes deep down it will happen. Everyone knows there's no magic in this world.
Sometimes the person who tries to keep everyone happy is the the most lonely one.
True freedom can't lean on anything. It's transient, lonely, and arduous.
If the only way to be granted life in this world is to surrender my body and soul to insanity, then I shall choose to meet my doom!
If you're going to modify me, at least turn me into a grasshopper man! Or a beetle! Or one of those imaginary freaks!
